description-en_US-print:
Compact, affordable and very easy to use, the Lexmark X632s brings all the benefits of multifunction printing to small workgroups with A4 mono needs. It integrates seamlessly into your existing network environment and offers a wide range of options, including advanced finishing and an extended warranty of up to four years! 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Affordable multifunction A4 monochrome laser

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Consolidated printing, copying, faxing and colour scanning

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Rapid 40 pages per minute for printing and copying

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Less than 8.5 seconds warm-up time to first printed page

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
300 MHz RISC processor and standard 65 MB of memory

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Network-ready with 10/100 Ethernet adapter

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Efficient document transmission via LDAP support

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enhanced data security and authentication features

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MarkVision Professional software to simplify network management

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Wide range of advanced finishing options

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Standard onsite support and extended warranty options
description-en_US-mobile: Lexmark X632s MFP
name: Lexmark X632s MFP

description-en_US-print:
An A4 multifunction device that evolves with you, Lexmark’s X634e offers enhanced security features, total ease of use and a major boost in productivity. Thanks to its intuitive colour touch-screen interface, users can operate it easily with little training. And it’s equipped with PostScript and PCL emulation to keep workflow soaring like never before! 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
High-performance multifunction A4 monochrome laser

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Intuitive colour touch-screen interface for hassle-free operation

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Lightning-fast 45 pages per minute for printing and copying

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PostScript and PCL emulation to optimise performance

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enhanced data security and authentication features

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Efficient document transmission via LDAP support

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Network-ready with 10/100 Ethernet adapter

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
“Zero Configuration” and advanced network management tools

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Wide range of flexible finishing options

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Standard onsite support and extended warranties available
description-en_US-mobile: Lexmark X634e MFP
name: Lexmark X634e MFP

description-fr_FR-print: Une solution 4-en-1 complète, performante et respectueuse de l’environnement\nLe MFC-J825DW est l’outil indispensable pour vos travaux personnels et/ou professionnels. Ce multifonction dispose de l’impression recto-verso automatique et aussi de l’impression sur CD/DVD pour parfaire vos CD/DVD. Rapide, vous avez également la possibilité de connecter une clé USB ou un appareil photo numérique grâce au port PictBridge et d’imprimer vos documents et photos sans avoir à allumer un ordinateur. Appréciez la convivialité de ce multifonction grâce à la navigation intuitive avec l’écran LCD couleur tactile de 8,3 cm.
description-fr_FR-mobile: MFC-J825DW - 1200 x 6000 dpi, 35 ppm, 192MHz, TFT LCD, Ethernet, USB 2.0, WLAN
description-en_US-print: This A4 inkjet all-in-one printer is the perfect choice for a home or small office environment. It provides you with all the professional standards you'd expect from your office equipment, fast quality printing, clear sharp copying, and high quality scanning and faxing, all in one compact machine. And because of its sleek black styling it will look just as good at home as it will in the office. There's no compromise on features, with automatic double-sided printing provided as standard to save time and money and wireless network-ready out of the box so you can share with other users. And because it's one of the most eco-friendly machines on the market you benefit from low power consumption and low noise levels.
description-en_US-mobile: MFC-J825DW - 1200 x 6000 dpi, 35 ppm, 192MHz, TFT LCD, Ethernet, USB 2.0, WLAN

Druckgeschwindigkeit in S/W. - Bis zu 10 ISO-Seiten/Min. Druckgeschwindigkeit in Farbe. - Bis zu 35 Seiten/Min. Druckgeschwindigkeit in S/W - Entwurfsmodus. - Bis zu 27 Seiten/Min. Druckgeschwindigkeit in Farbe - Entwurfsmodus. - Automatischer Duplexdruck inkl. Broschürendruckfunktion. - CD-Druck. - Integrierte Papierkassette für bis zu 100 Blatt. - Integrierte Fotopapierkassette für bis zu 20 Blatt. - 100 Jahre lichtechte Fotos mit Fotopapier BP-71. - Dokumentenecht drucken nach ISO 11798:2000. Farbkopierer - 20 Blatt Automatischer Vorlageneinzug (ADF). - Kopieren ohne PC. - Kopieren über ADF oder Vorlagenglas. - 8,3 cm Touchscreen. Farbfax - Faxen mit und ohne PC. - Werbefax-Löschfunktion. Farbscanner - Scan-to-E-Mail, -Bild, -Text, -Datei, -PDF, -USB-Stick, -Speicherkarte. Fotodirektdruck - Randloser Fotodruck bis A4. - Fotodirektdruck via PictBridge, USB-Stick, Speicherkarte. Integrierter LAN-/WLAN-MFC-Server - Drucken, Scannen und Faxen im LAN oder WLAN. iPrint&Scan - Direkt Drucken vom und Scannen zum iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Windows Phone sowie zu Android-Geräten. - Web Connect.
description-de_DE-mobile: MFC-J825DW - 4-in-1 Tinten-Multifunktionscenter mit integriertem LAN-/WLAN-MFC-Server, Touchscreen-Display und Duplex- und CD-Druck-Funktion
name: Brother MFC-J825DW multifunctional

description-en_US-print: Xerox® WorkCentre® 3550 Multifunction Printer Value-driven performance for your office. Raise the productivity bar. the WorkCentre 3550 helps your business optimise productivity with high-speed copy, print and fax capabilities, plus scan features that streamline your work processes. Step up to higher performance The perfect balance of productivity and easeof-use, the WorkCentre 3550 multifunction printer will help you regain time spent each day on document-related tasks. - Setting the pace. Print and copy speeds up to 33 ppm. - Plenty of paper. A paper capacity of 550-sheets (expandable to 1,050 sheets). - Improve your image. Impactful 1200 image quality printing and vibrant colour scanning. - Print from any application. A choice of PostScript® 3™ and PCL® print drivers ensure your output comes out the way you expect. - User friendly control panel. An efficient menu layout helps you accomplish routine tasks more quickly. - Multi-tasking enabler. now you can effectively accomplish all the tasks your single-function devices used to perform – receive faxes while you are making copies or printing – and save valuable office space. High-impact features that won’t impact your budget the WorkCentre 3550 is value-packed and capable of handling all your print, copy, scan and fax needs. - Duplex Automatic Document Feeder. Gives you convenient, money saving, twosided output across all features. - Reduce your document-related costs. Resource-saving features include toner-saver and power-saver modes, and paper-saving n-up printing and ID Card Copy. Plus, the WorkCentre 3550 is ENERGY STAR qualified. - Incorporate colour scanning into your workflow. Easily convert hardcopy documents to digital PDF files and send them to your server, email contacts or USB memory device. - Say hello to your modern fax machine. Get all the great features of a top fax machine – speed dials, Secure Fax, colour send, and LAn fax, and fax forward to email – plus many workflow enhancing capabilities. - Handy front panel USB port. Print from and scan files to your USB memory device. Designed with your workteam in mind With the WorkCentre 3550, office tasks that used to require multiple manual processes can be accomplished with the touch of a button. Built for the masses. Full support for your choice of operating system platforms, whether it’s Windows, Linux/UnIX or Macintosh. - Remote management tools. CentreWare® Internet Services provides real-time monitoring, device setup, viewing of toner and paper levels, plus efficient supplies ordering. Xerox Status Monitor alerts users when an error occurs during printing. - Control access to sensitive information. Information security is a universal need for every business. Secure print and secure fax capabilities keep your documents from printing until you’re ready to release them with a unique PIN. - Close to your workteam. All the features in one small footprint so that everything is conveniently at hand. - Maximise uptime. Just one integrated print cartridge to replace and a high-capacity paper tray.
description-en_US-mobile: WorkCentre 3550/XD, Print/Copy/Scan/Fax, Duplex, 33 ppm, 1200x1200dpi, 500sh, A4/LGL, USB 2.0, Fast Ethernet, 600W, 23.4kg, White/Blue
name: Xerox WorkCentre 3550/XD

description-en_US-print: High-Endurance Printing at Its Best Simplify high-volume jobs with a fast-thinking powerhouse featuring built-in duplexing, up to 50 ppm print speed, and generous input capacity (650 sheets standard, up to 4,300 sheets with options). Expertly handles a range of media sizes and types, plus offers a rich selection of paper handling and finishing options. Lexmark T652dn Let It Decide the Best Speed Identifies the size and complexity of your job and automatically calculates the optimal speed—quicker time-to-first-page for short jobs and more pages per minute for longer jobs. Lexmark T652dn Intelligent Job Waiting No more letting missing media derail hours of print time. The innovative Job Waiting feature will simply hold that job aside, letting others go on working without interruption (requires the hard disk option). Lexmark T652dn Outstanding Print Quality Combines true 1200 x 1200 dpi with automatic darkness adjustment and pixel-boosting technology to ensure high-quality, professional documents every time. Lexmark T652dn Cutting-Edge Security From network security to user-access restrictions, you’ll be fully equipped to keep valuable data safe and sound. In addition to IPSec, SNMPv3 and 802.1x network security, the Lexmark T652dn offers an alphanumeric pad for easy PIN authentication, plus encryption and disk wiping to secure the optional hard disk. Lexmark T652dn Less Work for IT Network-ready and very easy to set up, plus Universal Driver support for simple deployment. Includes Lexmark MarkVision™ Professional software for time-saving remote management and automated tools.
name: Lexmark T652DN

description-en_US-print: WorkCentre 6505 Colour Multifunction Printer The right solution for today’s pace of business. Your busy workteam needs a value-packed colour device that gets the job done with the rare combination of outstanding print quality, unparalleled simplicity, and day-in, day-out dependability. Introducing WorkCentre 6505. The colours your business needs WorkCentre 6505 colour multifunction printer give your important documents a powerful, colourful boost. - Outstanding print quality. A print resolution of up to 600 x 600 x 4 dpi makes your printed communications stand out and grab attention. - True Adobe® PostScript® 3™. Count on consistently precise print jobs with bright, true colours and superior graphics. - Advanced toner technology. Xeroxexclusive EA Toner uses particles engineered for uniform size and shape, producing superior image detail and line deﬁnition, and text that’s sharp and clear. - Always the right colour. Pantone® Colour approved solid-colour simulations and Xerox colour correction technology ensure results that match your expectations. Ready to help We designed WorkCentre 6505 as simple colour devices that support single users and small workteams. - Print and go. Work quickly with print speeds of up to 23 ppm for colour and black and white. - More productivity for more people. Connect and go, thanks to built-in networking and seamless compatibility with mixed-user environments, including PC, Macintosh and Linux. - Easy management. With Xerox CentreWare® IS, remote device administration is handled with ease right from your computer’s browser. - Out of colour toner? Our Run Black feature lets you continue printing with black until you can replace toner. - Total peace of mind. Standard one-year on-site warranty. Easy on your environment WorkCentre 6505 help you meet today’s environmental challenges. - Print more, use less. Whether you choose manual two-sided printing or upgrade to convenient automatic duplexing, you’ll conserve paper for reduced costs and lower environmental impact. - Toner-only cartridges. With minimal packaging, our toner-only cartridges allow for 80% less waste than comparable colour devices using integrated print cartridges. - A perfect ﬁt. Both devices feature a small footprint, which allows for easy integration within your work space, whether on your desk or in a shared location. - The quiet partner. Engineered for extraquiet operation to minimise impact on busy ofﬁces. - Consolidate and save. The value-packed WorkCentre 6505 multifunction printer will save on energy and supplies costs by combining the functions of multiple devices into one. Productivity, accelerated The WorkCentre 6505 colour multifunction printer builds on the outstanding print, delivering a host of powerful productivity tools designed to make your daily ofﬁce tasks more efﬁcient than ever.

name: Xerox WorkCentre 6505V/N

description-en_US-print: Competitive Edge - WorkCentre 3550 - Faster print and copy speed for greater productivity - Higher maximum paper capacity for fewer interruptions and less hassle - Productive fax features include colour fax send, searchable address book, fax forward to fax, email and server (FTP, SMB), fax reports, broadcast fax, delayed fax, secure fax receive, and 209 group dial entries - Scan features include scan to email with LDAP, network scan to PC, scan to FTP and SMB sites, USB memory device, direct scan to applications including optical character recognition - 355 mm platen glass allows manual scanning and copying of 216 x 355 mm documents - Robust security features include secure print, secure fax, scan to email authentication, SSL, HTTPS, IP filtering, and 802.1x, SNMPv3, IPv6 - LDAP authentication for simple and secure access restriction Productivity Features - WorkCentre 3550 - ID Card Copy feature is a major time-saver for offices that frequently copy small two-sided documents such as insurance cards and drivers licenses - PCL™ 6/5e emulations and Postscript™ 3™ support allow you to print any document with confidence - Available high-capacity print cartridge and substantial paper capacity keep the WorkCentre 3550 running with fewer interruptions - CentreWare™ Internet Services streamlines day-to-day operation by providing real-time monitoring, viewing of toner and paper levels, plus efficient supplies ordering - Industry-standard scan file formats include PDF, TIFF, multipage TIFF and JPEG for more document routing possibilities - PC fax saves time by allowing paperless faxing right from your desktop Business-ready Features - WorkCentre 3550 - Secure Print and Secure Fax keep documents private by holding print jobs in the queue until the user enters the password - IEEE 802.1x protocol controls network traffic and ensures security of wired and wireless connections - Additional security features such as authentication and IP filtering prevent unauthorized access to the WorkCentre 3550 - USB direct printing and scanning lets you save to or print from any USB memory device – no computer needed - Operating systems supported by the WorkCentre 3550 include Microsoft Windows XP and Vista, Apple Macintosh, and Linux/UNIX - A small footprint brings more features closer to users so there’s no need to go beyond the workspace to accomplish routine tasks Value-added Features - WorkCentre 3550 - One device gives you the right combination of office tools – print, copy, scan, and fax – at one great price - Colour scan and fax tools bring fax and paper documents easily to your network for distribution via email, fax, or through your LDAP address book - Network-ready with built-in Ethernet connectivity, remote management tools, and network security - Money-saving features include two-sided output, toner-save mode, variable sleep modes, advanced scanning, fax forward to email, and a high-capacity print cartridge make it easy to reduce toner and paper costs Software Solutions - WorkCentre 3550 Digitize . . . Organize . . . Distribute . . . Collaborate With digital documents, you can easily create, search, re-use, and build upon your documents. Maximize your hardware investments with innovative software solutions from Xerox and Xerox Business Partners: - Contain costs - Share knowledge - Accelerate workflow - Integrate paper and electronic documents - Manage and distribute documents effectively

(445.2 x 410.5 x 395.3 mm) Competitive Edge - WorkCentre 3210/3220 - Convenience and performance with print, copy, scan, and fax capabilities all in one compact device - High productivity right out of the box, to support busy professionals and small workteams with built-in networking and automated setup that helps you get up and running - Choose long-lasting high-capacity print cartridges to lower your cost per print and minimize printer intervention Features that save time - WorkCentre 3210/3220 - Fast print speeds of up to 24 / 30 ppm and a rapid first-page-out time of less than 8.5 seconds on WorkCentre 3220 deliver your documents in a hurry - Concurrent operation means you can quickly scan a file when you need it, even while other jobs are printing - No-hassle maintenance with only one customer-replaceable print cartridge Benefits for small offices - WorkCentre 3210/3220 - Space-saving design tucks into tight spaces and makes it easy to place within quick reach of a single user or small workgroup - User-friendly front panel helps you find your most-needed functions fast with large, easy-to-read buttons and a two-line LCD display - Set-up is a snap thanks to simplified network and driver installation

description-en_US-print: True office productivity on your desktop. The WorkCentre 3210 is a highly compact device complete with extensive features to increase performance and manage costs. This value-packed and reliable all-in-one print/copy/scan/fax device has been designed with individuals and small workteams in mind. Performance-tuned for busy professionals The WorkCentre 3210 puts a premium on efficiency, giving you the power and functions you need to stay on top of heavy workloads. - Fast output keeps pace with high demand. Print speeds up - to 30 ppm, and a rapid firstpage-out time of less than 8.5 seconds, deliver documents fast. - Concurrent operation means you can quickly scan a file when you need it, even while other jobs are printing. - Flexible paper handling. Reliably feed a wide variety of media, including cardstocks, transparencies, envelopes and papers ranging from 16 to 43 lb. (60 – 163 gsm). - Sharp, clear images and text, with up to 1200 x 1200 enhanced image quality plus PCL® 6 and PCL 5e printer languages. - Find your most-needed functions fast on the user-friendly front panel with large, easy-to-read buttons and a two-line LCD display. - Set-up is a snap, thanks to an installation video, and simplified network and driver installation. - No-hassle maintenance. An all-in-one userreplaceable print cartridge keeps intervention to a minimum, and a robust monthly duty cycle of up to 30,000 pages ensures reliable operation day after day. Outstanding overall value The WorkCentre 3210 delivers more for your money and helps small offices gain efficiency while keeping costs down. - Affordable price lets you add superior office capabilities without breaking your budget. - Combines critical functions. One device that does the work of four reduces operating costs and service calls. - High productivity right out of the box, with built-in networking and everything you need to start using this multifunction printer within a few minutes of setup. - Choose long-lasting high-capacity print cartridges to lower your cost per print and minimize printer intervention. - An array of security features such as Secure Fax Receive, which holds a fax until an authorized user logs in to retrieve it, along with SNMPv3 and IPv6, ensure that private data stays secure. - Xerox quality, reliability and performance are backed by Xerox Service and Support, a standard one-year warranty and the unmatched Xerox Total Satisfaction Guarantee. - Front panel USB port offers convenient scanning to and printing from a USB memory drive.
description-en_US-mobile: WorkCentre 3210 - 24 ppm, 50 sheets ADF, 600 x 600 dpi, 360 MHz Processor, 128MB, Fast Ethernet, USB 2.0, White + Scan And Cable Kit
name: Xerox WorkCentre 3210 + Scan And Cable Kit

description-fr_FR-print: Vivid color value meets enhanced productivity. Rely on professional color documents for up to 50% lower cost per page than lasers. Print from a mobile device with HP ePrint. Tap the intuitive 2.7-inch (6.96 cm) diagonal touchscreen on the wireless e-all-in-one to easily manage print jobs and use business apps. Spur office efficiency—get more done with automatic two-sided printing and a 250-sheet paper tray. Save energy with an ENERGY STAR® qualified product. Professional color for a lower cost than lasers. - Print professional color for up to 50% lower cost per page than lasers, and get a better value for frequent printing. Efficient Web connectivity—even print on the go. - Print from a variety of mobile devices on the go. With HP ePrint—now you can print from virtually anywhere. Standout versatility with copy and scan solutions. - Create flawless copies with CopySmart solutions, and easily print two-sided identification cards. Exceptional energy and resource savings. - Use up to 50% less energy than lasers with this ENERGY STAR® qualified printer, and preset On or Off times.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Thermal Inkjet, 128 Mb, 360 MHz, Duplex, USB 2.0, LAN, RJ11, Wi-Fi, 8.1 Kg
description-en_US-print: Produce professional color for less than lasers page after page, and accelerate productivity with apps on the large touchscreen, networking options and versatile e-all-in-one performance. Easily print from a mobile device with HP ePrint.[6] Professional color for a lower cost than lasers. - Print professional color for up to 50% lower cost per page than lasers, and get a better value for frequent printing.[4] - Print documents that resist fading, water and highlighter-pen smears, using HP Officejet inks.[2][3] - Achieve ISO print speeds up to 18 ppm black and 13 ppm color, using affordable, individual inks.[5] - Depend on a printer with a 25,000-page monthly duty cycle—the perfect fit for reliable color printing. Efficient Web connectivity—even print on the go.[6] - Print from a variety of mobile devices on the go. With HP ePrint—now you can print from virtually anywhere.[6] - Use the intuitive touchscreen to access business apps, plus quickly print and store files. - Easily view and print photos from a USB drive and memory cards. - Stay connected—share on a wireless or wired network.[7] Standout versatility with copy and scan solutions. - Create flawless copies with CopySmart solutions, and easily print two-sided identification cards. - Automatically print two-sided documents, and decrease intervention with the 250-sheet paper tray. - Improve workflow—send quick faxes, scan documents to a PC or e-mail, and more. - Create borderless, double-sided flyers and brochures, plus print impressive business photos. Exceptional energy and resource savings. - Use up to 50% less energy than lasers with this ENERGY STAR® qualified printer, and preset On or Off times. - Easily recycle cartridges, and use up to 70% less supplies and packaging by weight compared with lasers. - Consume up to 50% less paper while printing, using automatic two-sided printing. - Use Original HP ink cartridges for quality, reliability and rewards. - [2]Based on paper-industry predictions for acid-free papers and Original HP inks; colorant stability data at room temperature based on similar systems tested per ISO 11798 and ISO 18909. - [3]Based on HP internal testing, using paper with the ColorLok® logo. - [4]Compared with the HP Officejet 950/951 Black and color ink cartridges.High-capacity cartridges not included; please purchase separately. - [5]After first set of ISO test pages. - [6]Requires an Internet connection to the printer. Feature works with any connected Internet- and e-mail-capable device. Print times may vary. Some HP LaserJets may require a firmware upgrade. For a list of supported documents, and image types - [7]Wireless performance is dependent upon physical environment and distance from access point. Wireless operations compatible with 2.4 GHz routers only. - [13]Availability of rewards varies by country.

description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Vivid color value meets enhanced productivity. Rely on professional color documents for up to 50% lower cost per page than lasers.1 Print from a mobile device with HP ePrint.3 Tap the intuitive 2.7-inch (6.96 cm) diagonal touchscreen on the wireless4 e-all-in-one to easily manage print jobs and use business apps.6 Spur office efficiency—get more done with automatic two-sided printing and a 250-sheet paper tray. Save energy with an ENERGY STAR® qualified product.

Features
Professional color for a lower cost than lasers.1
• Print professional color for up to 50% lower cost per page than lasers,1 and get a better value for frequent printing.2

Efficient Web connectivity—even print on the go.3
• Print from a variety of mobile devices on the go. With HP ePrint—now you can print from virtually anywhere.3

Standout versatility with copy and scan solutions.
• Create flawless copies with CopySmart solutions, and easily print two-sided identification cards.

Exceptional energy and resource savings.
• Use up to 50% less energy than lasers with this ENERGY STAR® qualified printer,5 and preset On or Off times.

description-en_US-print:
Overview
Take advantage of easy wireless printing and sharing at home—even print through e-mail.12 Designed to deliver dependable performance, this affordable e-all-in-one makes it easy to copy and scan, and conserve resources.

Features
Get easy wireless printing—even print through e-mail.12
• Use HP ePrint mobile printing—if you can e-mail it, you can print it.1

Print, scan and copy affordably.
• Easily print, scan and copy everyday documents from an intuitive, 2.0-inch (5.08 cm) mono display.

Count on dependable performance and convenience.
• Reduce the time you spend waiting for prints—jobs finish in as little time as 21 seconds.3

Reduce energy consumption and conserve resources.
• Save energy, using an e-all-in-one that is ENERGY STAR® qualified.

1Requires an Internet connection to the printer. Feature works with any Internet- and e-mail-capable device. Print times may vary. For a list of supported documents and image types, see http://www.hp.com/go/eprintcenter.

description-en_US-print: Lexmark X125 is designed for small office/home office (SOHO) settings where space is at a premium. It combines color print, standalone fax, scan and copy capabilities, offering exceptional value, a compact design and convenience that cannot be matched by purchasing separate peripherals. The X125 All-In-One Office Center features Lexmark's award-winning core inkjet technology. With 2400 x 1200 dots per inch (dpi) resolution in black and color on all paper types and a seven-picoliter color drop size, text is sharp and photo-quality images are vivid and textured - giving business documents and presentations professional appeal. Lexmark's Accu-Feed paper handling system virtually eliminates paper .jams and misfeeds, allowing SOHO professionals to print on a wide variety of media including transparencies, labels, multiple envelope sizes and postcards. The X125 boasts mono print speeds of up to 16 pages per minute (ppm), the fastest in the industry, and up to eight ppm in color. The Windows-compatible X125 offers Universal Serial Bus (USB) connectivity. The sheet-fed scanner offers up to 600 x 1200 dpi optical resolution (up to 9600 dpi enhanced resolution) and 36-bit color scan depth. Users will find the X125 perfect for scanning color photos and images to incorporate into business documents. Offering added functionality to a home office, the X125 operates as a standalone color copier capable of generating up to 12 copies per minute (cpm) in black and up to 5 cpm in color. The LCD screen enables users to easily copy up to 99 black or color copies from one original, and to resize photos and documents from 25 to 200 percent.
name: Lexmark X125

description-en_US-print: This high productivity sheetfed all-in-one offers professional photo quality printing plus fast and easy faxing, scanning and copying. Its innovative design means you can stow the fold-up paper trays and still receive faxes and print documents.
description-en_US-mobile: Space-saving ultra-compact all-in-one
name: HP Officejet 4215 All-in-One

description-en_US-print:
Delivering exceptional photo quality designed with elegance Get photo quality colour printing, scanning and copying in one single, stylish unit. The SmartBase MP360 combines elegance, ease and efficiency with practical features such as borderless printing. Benefit from true-to-life colours, detailed images and crisp, clear text on both plain and photo paper. The SmartBase MP360 uses a print head containing micro-nozzles that eject tiny 2 picolitre ink droplets with extraordinary precision. This advanced MicroFine Droplet Technology means that you get the highest print quality - right up to a 4800 x 1200 dots per inch resolution. Printing or copying photos usually results in a white frame around the edge of the paper. With the SmartBase MP360 you can print right up to the paper's edge, without any border. And by using special photo or glossy paper, you can produce ready-to-frame photographs or other material on A4, 4" x 6" and 5" x 7" sizes. Plus printing is fast, without compromising colour quality.
    * High image quality All-in-One
    * Professional photo quality
    * Advanced Microfine Droplet Technology
    * 2 pl ink droplets
    * Fast print/copy speed
    * CCD scanner, 1200 x 2400 dpi
    * Borderless print/copy
    * Hi-Speed USB 2.0 interface
    * Compact design

name: Canon SMARTBASE MP360 A4 18PPM

description-en_US-print:
Built for your most demanding document needs, these powerful multifunction devices support media sizes up to A3 and deliver A4 print and copy speeds as fast as 45 pages per minute. You’ll benefit from flexible paper handling, advanced finishing options, leading-edge security and the simplicity of Lexmark’s user-friendly e-Task colour touch screen. Best of all, the Lexmark X862de 4 is solutions-ready. Gain real momentum by adding application solutions tailored to the way you work!

- Up to 45 ppm, as fast as 6 seconds to first page.
- Duplex printing, copying and scanning.
- Fax option available.
- Customisable 9-inch colour touch screen.
- Gigabit networking and 800MHz processor.
- 1,100-sheet standard input, 500-sheet output capacity.
- Toner cartridge yield: 35,000* pages.
- Recommended monthly volume: 15,000 to 50,000 pages.

Available models:
- Lexmark X862de 3: duplex MFP with optional fax function.
- Lexmark X862de 4: duplex MFP with standard fax function.

description-fr_FR-print: Un multifonction 4-en-1 économique, convivial et rapide Equipé du recto-verso automatique en impression, le MFC-J625DW vous permet de réduire la consommation de papier et ainsi faire des économies. De plus, gagnez du temps grâce à la numérisation et la copie automatique de vos documents de plusieurs pages à travers le chargeur automatique de documents. Avec un écran LCD couleur de 8,3 cm à commandes tactiles, accédez à l’ensemble des paramètres d’impression devient un jeu d’enfant. La navigation devient intuitive et conviviale. - Vitesses d'impression de 35 ppm en N&B et 27 ppm en couleur - Impression recto-verso automatique - Connexion WiFi 802.11b/g/n - Cartouches haute capacité - Chargeur automatique de documents et Fax 14,4 kbps.
description-fr_FR-mobile: MFC-J625DW - 1200 x 6000dpi, 35ppm, A4-A6, USB 2.0, WLAN
description-en_US-print: This A4 inkjet all-in-one printer is the perfect choice for a home or small office environment. It provides you with all the professional standards you'd expect from your office equipment, fast quality printing, clear sharp copying, and high quality scanning and faxing, all in one compact machine. And because of its sleek black styling it will look just as good at home as it will in the office. There's no compromise on features, with automatic double-sided printing provided as standard to save time and money and wireless network-ready out of the box so you can share with other users. And because it's one of the most eco-friendly machines on the market you benefit from low power consumption and low noise levels.
description-en_US-mobile: MFC-J625DW - A4 inkjet all-in-one printer, 6000 x 1200 dpi, 35/27 ppm
description-de_DE-print: Farbdrucker - 6-Farbdruckqualität mit nur 4 Patronen dank 1,5 pl Tröpfchen-Technologie. - Flüsterleiser Druck durch kapillares Tintensystem. - 4 separate Tintenpatronen. - Bis zu 12 ISO-Seiten/Min. Druckgeschwindigkeit in S/W. - Bis zu 10 ISO-Seiten/Min. Druckgeschwindigkeit in Farbe. - Bis zu 35 Seiten/Min. Druckgeschwindigkeit in S/W - Entwurfsmodus. - Bis zu 27 Seiten/Min. Druckgeschwindigkeit in Farbe - Entwurfsmodus. - Automatischer Duplexdruck inkl. Broschürendruckfunktion. - Integrierte Papierkassette für bis zu 100 Blatt. - Integrierte Fotopapierkassette für bis zu 20 Blatt. - 100 Jahre lichtechte Fotos mit Fotopapier BP-71. - Dokumentenecht drucken nach ISO 11798:2000. Farbkopierer - 20 Blatt Automatischer Vorlageneinzug (ADF). - Kopieren ohne PC. - Kopieren über ADF oder Vorlagenglas. - 4,9 cm Touchscreen mit berührungsempfindlichem Bedienfeld. Farbfax - Faxen mit und ohne PC. - Werbefax-Löschfunktion. Farbscanner - Scan-to-E-Mail, -Bild, -Text, -Datei, -PDF, -USB-Stick, -Speicherkarte. Fotodirektdruck - Randloser Fotodruck bis A4. - Fotodirektdruck via PictBridge, USB-Stick, Speicherkarte. Integrierter WLAN-MFC-Server - Drucken, Scannen und Faxen im WLAN. iPrint&Scan - Direkt Drucken vom und Scannen zum iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Windows Phone sowie zu Android-Geräten.
description-de_DE-mobile: MFC-J625DW - 4-in-1 Tinten-Multifunktionscenter mit integriertem WLAN-MFC-Server, Touchscreen-Display und Duplexdruck-Funktion
name: Brother MFC-J625DW multifunctional

description-fr_FR-print: Une incroyable souplesse en A4 et en A3 Grâce à sa technologie de pointe récompensée par de nombreux prix, le MC851 apporte la souplesse d'un multifonction A4/A3 4-en-1 : impression, numérisation, photocopie et télécopie sont accessibles à toutes les entreprises dont les volumes d'impression sont peu élevés. Le MC851 cest commercialisé à un prix très compétitif, permettant de produire en interne, avec un budget toujours maitrisé, des documents d'aspect professionnel, de grande qualité, en couleur haute définition, réduisant ainsi les couts d'impression externalisés tout en offrant la possibilité d'imprimer les documents dont vous avez besoin, quand vous en avez besoin. Des fonctionnalités qui apportent de la valeur à votre entreprise Très ergonomique, le MC851 est livré avec des logiciels et utilitaires très pratiques, répondant ainsi à tout ce qu'attendent les entreprises d'un appareil multifonction, incluant : - impression recto-verso en standard - gestion du papier très souple avec impression sur un large éventail de supports comme étiquettes CD/DVD, cartes de visite et bannières jusqu'à 1,20 m de long en standard, pour imprimer tous vos documents de travail au quotidien - touches dédiées pour la copie, la numérisation, l'impression et la télécopie - numérisation vers dossier réseau, e-mail, PC/Mac - possibilité de faxer directement depuis un ordinateur ou de rerouter les fax entrants vers un ordinateur - LDAP embarqué pour accéder aux contacts et adresses e-mail à partir d'un répertoire existant - la fonction « Interruption de travail » suspend temporairement une tache d'impression en cours afin d’autoriser un utilisateur à copier des documents urgents par exemple - les « Taches Programmées » permettent de gagner un temps précieux en définissant les fonctions de configuration régulièrement utilisées - la garantie 3 ans en standard protège votre investissement - Une technologie réputée pour sa fiabilité sur laquelle vous pouvez compter Grâce à sa technologie d'impression numérique LED récompensée par de nombreux prix, le MC851 est fiable et robuste, garantissant des numérisations de qualité supérieure et des vitesses d'impression rapides atteignant 34ppm en mono et 22ppm en A4 pour des documents et des couleurs en haute définition . Outils de gestion et de contrôle intuitifs Le MC851 est livré avec de nombreux logiciels destinés à tirer le meilleur parti de votre multifonction et à vous aider à gérer et à améliorer votre productivité tout en réduisant vos coûts. Par exemple, contrôlez l'utilisation de votre imprimante, attribuez des droits d'accès aux différents utilisateurs, rationalisezvotre gestion documentaire, notamment le partage ou l’archivage des fichiers. Le MC851 est un multifonction compact réseau 4-en-1 capable d'imprimer, de copier, de numériser et de faxer. Fiable, abordable à l'achat et économique à l'usage, il aide les enteprises et groupes de travail à gagner en productivité et en efficacité.
description-fr_FR-mobile: PowerPC750 500MHz, 512MB RAM, 40GB HDD, 14.478 cm (5.7 ") LCD, 24/34 ppm, 1200 x 600dpi, USB, Fast Ethernet, Grise
description-en_US-print: Affordable A3/A4 versatility Based on award winning technology, the MC851 makes versatile A3/A4 printing, scanning, photocopying and faxing accessible to every business. The MC851 comes at a highly competitive price, enabling budget conscious businesses to produce in-house, high quality, professional documents in rich high definition colour, reducing outsourced print costs and providing the ability to print what you need, when you need it. Adding value to your business The MC851 is ergonomically designed and packed full of useful features, offering everything a business needs from a multifunctional device, including: - duplex printing as standard - flexible media handling from CD labels, business cards and banners to standard, day-to-day business documents - one touch Copy, Scan, Print and Fax buttons - scan to USB stick, client, email or network PC - fax directly from a PC or forward incoming faxes to a PC - embedded LDAP provides direct access to contact and email data in an existing directory file - Job Program allows users to save time by defining regularly used functions for repeated use - Job Interrupt temporarily pauses the device, allowing users to copy urgent documents without disrupting the workflow - three year warranty as standard to protect your investment - Reliable, tried and tested technology - Using award winning, tried and tested digital LED printing technology, the MC851 is reliable and robust, offering high quality scanning and A4 print speeds of up to 34ppm mono and 22ppm colour in high definition. Intuitive management and control tools The MC851 includes a wide range of in-the-box software utilities to help you manage and improve productivity whilst reducing your support costs. For example, control your print usage and user access rights, streamline your document handling and assist with file sharing or archiving. The MC851 is a truly integrated, network ready multifunction product that can print, copy, scan and fax bringing extra productivity, capability and cost-savings to the busy workgroup and small business. MC851cdtn - Network & duplex as standard with tall cabinet and 2nd paper tray With networking as standard, the MC851cdtn also has integrated duplex capabilities, for double-sided printing. The cabinet provides extra storage space whilst the 2nd tray provides an additional 530-sheet capacity allowing print to continue for longer without user intervention
description-en_US-mobile: PowerPC750 500MHz, 512MB RAM, 40GB HDD, 14.478 cm (5.7 ") LCD, 24/34 ppm, 1200 x 600dpi, USB, Fast Ethernet, Grey
name: OKI MC851cdtn

- Drucken, Scannen, Kopieren & Faxen
- Überragende Druckgeschwindigkeit: A4: 26 Farbseiten bzw. 34 Monoseiten pro Minute | A3: 15 Farbseiten bzw. 17 Monoseiten pro Minute
- Zeit bis zum ersten Druck: 10/9,5 Sekunden in Farbe/Mono
- Auflösung: 1.200 x 600 dpi + ProQ2400 Technologie
- Papierformate: A3, A4, A5, A6, B5, Briefumschläge, Etiketten, Folien, Visitenkarten, Banner bis 1.200 mm
- Papierfassungsvermögen: 400 - max. 1.460 Blatt
- Druckersprachen: PCL 5c, PCL 6 (Windows), PostScript (Windows/Mac)
- Schnittstellen: Hi-Speed USB, 10/100-TX Ethernet, Parallel Port

Der MC861 ist die perfekte Wahl für Unternehmen mit höheren Druckvolumen in einer anspruchsvollen Arbeitsgruppe. Sie profitieren von niedrigeren Anschaffungskosten und genießen dennoch gleichbleibend hohe Qualität und all die Funktionen und Vorteile, die Mehrwert für Ihr Unternehmen bieten. Mit diesem robusten und äußerst zuverlässigen Produkt profitieren Sie von vielseitigen Druck-, Kopier-, Scan- und Faxfunktionen im A4- und A3-Format. Die High-Definition-Qualität verleiht Ihren Dokumenten dabei jedes Mal ein professionelles Aussehen.

description-en_US-print: The MC851 has been designed for the budget conscious business that needs the flexibility of an A3 colour MFP combined with a highly-competitive entry price but without compromising on functionality. - Easy to use graphical LCD display with simple navigation of advanced features. Plus one-touch Copy, Scan, Print and Fax buttons for simplified interaction - Scan to USB stick via Host USB port for convenient file sharing - Scanning to client, email or network PC improves document communications and management - Fax A4 and A3 single and double sided documents or to save paper send faxes directly from a PC - Forward incoming faxes to an email account saving paper and increasing document workflow efficiency - Embedded LDAP provides direct access to contact and email data in an existing database, saving time and improving the reliability of document delivery - Job Program allows users to save time by def.ining regularly used functions for repeated use - Job Interrupt temporarily pauses the device, allowing users to copy urgent documents without disrupting the workflow - Secure Print password protects print jobs so only authorised persons can retrieve them, whilst encryption takes care of data security as it travels across the network queue, allowing users to copy urgent documents
description-en_US-mobile: MC851DN, colour laser, Printer/Scaner/Copier/Fax, A3, 34/22ppm, 40GB, USB, Ethernet, Paralel, Grey
name: OKI MC851DN

description-en_US-print: Powerful color performance for your workgroup Power up your office with the Lexmark X954dhe, featuring high-performance A3 color functionality, flexible features, easy-to-use workflow solutions, advanced security, extra 2,520-sheet input and 2GB RAM. Intuitive Color Touch screen The extra large 10.2-inch color touch screen allows you to operate your MFP with ease through intuitive navigation and easy access to workflow solutions. Protecting Your Information Multilayered security features help protect your devices, your documents, your information, and your network infrastructure. Advanced Finishing Options Easily create professional output in-house with flexible finishing options, including multi-position stapling, hole punch, expanded output stacking, and booklet capability. Outstanding A3 Color Output PANTONE® calibration helps ensure consistent color tones and Named Color Replacement makes color matching easy. Exceptional Media Handling Ultra-reliable paper feeding lets you load up to six different media types, including banner support up to 47.24-inches and weights up to 300 gsm. and weights up to 300 gsm. Productive and Intuitive Scan to multiple destinations: scan to e-mail, scan to FTP, scan to fax, scan to network, scan to USB drive, and more.
description-en_US-mobile: Copy, Fax, Print, Scann, Color LED, 1200 x 1200 dpi, 55 ppm, 5.0 seconds, 250000 pages per month, USB 2.0, Ethernet, 159.6 kg
name: Lexmark X954dhe

description-en_US-print: Color solutions. Workgroup productivity. The Lexmark X548de is designed for midsize workgroups that want more color printing features, productivity solutions and security—all in a small footprint. Lexmark X548de Intuitive Color Touch Screen The intuitive 7-inch touch screen provides print and scan preview features and helps you select documents or specific pages within a document. Professional Color Performance PANTONE® calibration helps ensure consistent color tones and Named Color Replacement makes color matching easy. Productive and Intuitive Scan to multiple destinations: scan to e-mail, scan to FTP, scan to fax, scan to network, scan to USB drive, and more. Duplex Automatic Document Feeder Save time by scanning both sides of your document with duplex color-scanning capabilities and 50-sheet input capacity. Secure Printing Supports a variety of user authentication and authorization controls; IPSec, SNMPv3 and 802.1x network security are supported. Expandable Input Print on multiple paper types; boost your total input capacity up to 1,450 sheets.
description-en_US-mobile: Color Laser, 23 ppm, 12.5 sec, 1200 x 1200 dpi, 512 MB, 48 dBA, 1000 - 4000 pages, 27.8 kg
name: Lexmark X548de

description-en_US-print: Business productivity with robust color performance The Lexmark X792dte color multifunction printer combines robust color printing with flexible finishing options, expanded input capacity, productivity solutions and an intuitive color touch screen. Intuitive Color Touch Screen The extra large 10.2-inch color touch screen allows you to operate your printer with ease and confidence through smart and intuitive navigation, easy access to workflow solutions and shortcuts, and the ability to preview your documents and print jobs at the device. Flexible Output Options Choose from four output options, including a five-bin mailbox, an offset stacker, a staple finisher, and a staple with hole punch finisher. Advance Copy Functions Advanced copy functions let you interrupt long print runs to make a quick copy, and proof the first copy set before completing your copy job. Scan to Multiple Destinations Scan to multiple destinations, including scan to email, scan to FTP, scan to fax, scan to network, and more. Lexmark Solutions Reduce unnecessary printing and simplify work processes through solutions applications preloaded on your device. Choose additional Lexmark solutions to fit your unique workflow needs. Long-lasting Toner The Lexmark Extra High Yield Print Cartridge delivers up to 20,000* pages, reducing interventions, cartridge waste and cost. * Average continuous black or composite CMY declared cartridge yield in accordance with ISO/IEC 19798.
description-en_US-mobile: Color Laser, 1200 x 1200 dpi, 8 seconds, 150000 pages per month, 1024 MB, 1.2 GHz, Color, Duplex, Scan, Copy, Touch Screen, Network, USB
name: Lexmark X792dte

description-fr_FR-mobile: Vous cherchez un appareil multifonction qui allie économies et puissance ? L’imprimante laser multifonction monochrome de la série SCX-4728FD de Samsung est exactement ce qu’il vous faut.
description-en_US-print: For a multifunction device that delivers the ultimate balance of economy and power, look no further than the Samsung Mono Laser Multifunction Printer SCX-4728FD Series. Get more from every page with Duplex printing Double your print output. Or, halve your paper costs. Either way you look at it; there is no denying that Duplex printing is an essential feature for both business and personal printing. It provides loads of cool and creative ways to fulfill print jobs, from single-sided formats to double-sided booklet formats, and really delivers a professional look and feel every time. The double-sided printing capabilities will also massively reduce costs and ensure that your paper supplies last longer. This then helps reduce waste, and minimises your impact on the environment. So, it is definitely a win-win situation with Duplex printing. Being eco-friendly just got easier Make hitting your environmental goals a whole lot easier with Samsung’s new Eco Mode, which also includes a Results Simulator to check how well you are doing. The Eco Mode features a one touch Eco Button, which conveniently serves as your default setting once activated, and reduces paper consumption with Duplex printing, 2 or 4-up printing and a Toner Save setting. Thanks to the Results Simulator, you can really appreciate how much good work you are doing. The simulation shows levels of carbon dioxide emissions, electricity and paper usage. The Eco Mode is an easy and effective way of keeping track of your printer consumption – which is better for you and the planet! It multi-tasks so you don’t have to Productivity is a key to running any office or professional workgroup. The ultra-versatile, fast-printing SCX-4728FD is designed to deliver productivity. Now you can print, copy, scan and fax with convenience, ease and speed. Why clutter a corner of your office with several different machines when all you need is one versatile device – the 4-in-1 SCX-4728FD laser multifunction printer. Work better with Fast Speed printing performance Print documents (small or large) quickly thanks to Samsung’s Fast Speed printing, which is made possible with the 533MHz CPU and 128MB memory. Perfect for getting important work documents printed with high quality and zero fuss, the faster printing speeds will also help boost office productivity and enhance workflows. A reliable and superior printer like this will quickly become a must-have business tool - you’ll wonder how your business ever functioned without one. Connect with your colleagues Connect everyone in your office to one network and keep everything running smoothly. They’ll share a common printer and you’ll save time from servicing multiple machines. And with the Ethernet interface you can increase your performance by hooking it up to the network. Improve your communication skills with the Streamline work with easy-to-use printers laser printer and keep your lines of communication open. A top printer that’s low on noise From a company that knows its business, the new Samsung Streamline work with easy-to-use printers printer can work flat out at a mere 50 decibels, an office-friendly volume you won‘t be hearing our competitors shout about. With a standby volume of 30dBA, it signals an end to colleagues having to scream to be heard, even before their printing has begun. Doors can stay open along corridors as the SCX-4728FD outperforms the other leading printers copy after copy. Ideal for small, stylish spaces and busy places Finally, your desk can look stylish because of your printer, not in spite of it. The Samsung SCX-4728FD laser printer has an elegant exterior design, sure to fit in with any workspace. Its top cover looks chic and polished while offering dust-free protection. Spiff up your space with a desktop accessory that actually helps you work better. Capture what catches your eye Samsung’s AnyWeb Print software lets you go hunting and gathering on the Web. You can utilise the SCX-4728FD to easily select, drag and drop content from different web pages onto a printable scrap board in your browser window, all while you surf. It’s the easy way to collect, arrange and edit those useful reference points and resources you can only find on the Internet for that big project ? or just for fun.
description-en_US-mobile: SCX-4728FD, Mono Laser, 28ppm A4, 29ppm Letter, Print/Copy/Scan/Fax, Duplex, Network, 10.3kg
description-de_DE-print: Die Samsung S / W-Laser-Multifunktionsdrucker SCX-4728FD Serie bietet ein Multifunktionsgerät, bei dem Umweltfreundlichkeit und Leistung im idealen Gleichgewicht stehen. Holen Sie mit Duplex-Druck mehr aus jeder Seite heraus Verdoppeln Sie Ihre Druckausgabe. Oder halbieren Sie Ihre Papierkosten. Egal, wie Sie es betrachten ist der Duplex-Druck eine wichtige Funktion für Drucker in Geschäftsumgebungen und im persönlichen Bereich. Die Funktion bietet viele coole und kreative Möglichkeiten, Druckaufträge von einseitigen Formaten bis zu doppelseitigen Buchformaten zu verarbeiten und liefert immer professionelles und edles Aussehen. Die Funktionen für doppelseitiges Drucken senken außerdem die Kosten beträchtlich und sorgen dafür, dass der Papiervorrat länger hält. Der Abfall wird verringert und die Auswirkungen auf die Umwelt werden minimiert. Duplex-Druck bietet also für alle Beteiligten viele Vorteile. Jetzt noch einfacher mehr für die Umwelt tun Durch den neuen Eco-Modus von Samsung mit dem Ergebnissimulator, der den Status anzeigt, können Sie Ihre Umweltziele noch einfacher erreichen. Der Eco-Modus wird über eine One-Touch-Taste bedient, die den Modus beim Aktivieren als Standard festlegt. Der Papierverbrauch wird dann durch Duplex-Druck und 2- oder 4-Seiten-Druck verringert und der Tonersparmodus ist außerdem eingeschaltet. Dank des Ergebnissimulators können Sie jetzt sehen, wie viel gute Arbeit Sie für die Umwelt leisten. Die Simulation zeigt die Kohlendioxidbilanz sowie den Strom- und Papierverbrauch. Der Eco-Modus ist eine einfache und effektive Methode, Ihren Druckverbrauch im Auge zu behalten und sich sowie unserer Umwelt einen Gefallen zu tun! Eine Arbeitserleichterung mit Multitasking Produktivität steht in jedem Büro oder bei jeder professionellen Arbeitsgruppe an erster Stelle. Der sehr vielseitige, schnell druckende SCX-4728FD ist für Produktivität ausgelegt. Sie können jetzt bequem, einfach und schnell drucken, kopieren, scannen und faxen. Warum sollten Sie verschiedene Geräte im Büro aufstellen, wenn Sie nur ein vielseitiges Gerät benötigen: den 4-in-1 SCX-4728FD Laser-Multifunktionsdrucker. Besseres Arbeiten mit schneller Druckgeschwindigkeit Dank der CPU mit 533 MHz und dem Speicher mit 128 MB bietet Samsung schnelle Druckgeschwindigkeiten für große und kleine Dokumente. Durch die schnelle Druckgeschwindigkeit können Sie wichtige Arbeitsdokumente problemlos und mit hoher Qualität drucken, dabei die Produktivität im Büro steigern und die Arbeitsabläufe verbessern. Ein zuverlässiger und überlegener Drucker wie dieser wird schnell zum unerlässlichen Werkzeug und Sie werden sich fragen, wie die Geschäfte jemals ohne liefen. In Verbindung mit Ihren Kollegen Stellen Sie in Ihrem Büro für alle eine Netzwerkverbindung her und sorgen Sie für einen reibungslosen Arbeitsablauf. Sie können alle einen gemeinsamen Drucker verwenden, was Ihnen Zeit wie auch die Wartung mehrerer Geräte einspart. Und mit der Ethernet-Schnittstelle können Sie die Leistung durch Anbindung an das Netzwerk erhöhen. Optimieren Sie mit dem bedienerfreundlichen Laserdrucker Ihre Kommunikationsfähigkeiten und bleiben Sie allzeit bereit. Ein toller Drucker mit niedrigem Geräuschpegel Dank der weitreichenden Erfahrung von Samsung arbeitet die neue Produktreihe der bedienerfreundlichen Drucker mit nur 50 Dezibel – ideal fürs Büro und unbeliebt bei unserer Konkurrenz. Im Standby liegt der Geräuschpegel bei 30 dBA, damit Kollegen nicht bereits vor dem Druckvorgang schreien müssen, um sich Gehör zu verschaffen. Sie müssen die Türen zum Gang nicht schließen, da der SCX-4728FD die anderen führenden Drucker bei jeder gedruckten Seiten in den Schatten stellt. Ideal für enge, stilvolle Ecken und viel genutzte Plätze Endlich sieht Ihr Schreibtisch mit Drucker cool und schön aus. Der Samsung SCX-4728FD Laserdrucker hat ein elegantes Gehäuse, das in jeden Arbeitsbereich passt. Die Abdeckung sieht schick und sauber aus und schützt gleichzeitig vor Staub. Verschönern Sie Ihren Schreibtisch mit Zubehör, das Ihnen bei der Arbeit hilft. Erfassen, was Ihnen ins Auge sticht Mit der Software AnyWeb Print von Samsung können Sie im Internet jagen und sammeln. Sie können mit dem SCX-4728FD einfach Inhalte von verschiedenen Internetseiten auswählen und zum späteren Drucken in einen speziellen Bereich in Ihrem Browserfenster ziehen – und dabei weiter surfen. Es ist eine einfache Möglichkeit, diese nützlichen Referenzpunkte und Ressourcen für Ihr großes Projekt oder nur zum Spaß zu sammeln, zu ordnen und zu bearbeiten, die Sie nur im Internet finden.
description-de_DE-mobile: SCX-4728FD, Mono Laser, 28ppm A4, 29ppm Letter, Print/Kopie/Scan/Fax, Duplex, Network, 10.3kg
name: Samsung SCX-4728FD multifunctional

description-fr_FR-print:
Optimisez vos impressions
Doublez votre rendement ou réduisez de moitié vos coûts en papier. L'impression recto verso est une caractéristique essentielle, tant pour l'impression professionnelle que personnelle. Elle offre de nombreuses possibilités créatives comme pour faire des livrets par exemple. L’impression double face vous permet également de réduire nettement vos coûts et de faire durer vos réserves de papier plus longtemps. En plus de faire des économies, vous minimisez votre impact sur l’environnement. Avec l’impression recto verso, vous serez gagnant à tous les coups !
Respecter l'environnement plus facilement
Le mode éco est activé par simple pression sur la touche "Eco" et agit comme mode par défaut une fois activé. Il vous permet de réduire votre consommation de papier grâce à l'impression recto verso, à l'impression recto 2 ou 4 pages par feuille et au paramètre d'économie de toner. En outre, le simulateur de résultats vous permet d'évaluer précisément vos progrès. La simulation vous montre votre niveau d’émissions de CO², ainsi que votre consommation d’électricité et de papier. Le mode éco est une manière facile et pratique de surveiller la consommation de votre imprimante. Un avantage pour vous et pour la planète !
Il est multitâche pour que vous n’ayez pas à l’être
La productivité est un élément clé pour tout bureau et groupe de travail. Le multifonction SCX-4729FW a été conçu pour améliorer la productivité. Maintenant, vous pouvez imprimer, copier et scanner facilement et rapidement. Pourquoi encombrer un coin de votre bureau avec plusieurs machines quand le SCX-4729FW peut tout faire?
Travaillez mieux grâce à l'impression efficace
Imprimez rapidement des documents (petits et grands) grâce au processeur 533 MHz et à la mémoire de 128 Mo. Idéales pour imprimer des volumes soutenus de documents de travail, la vitesse d'impression de 28 pages par minute vous aidera à augmenter la productivité du bureau. Un multifonction fiable et efficace comme celle-ci deviendra très vite un outil indispensable pour votre bureau. Vous vous demanderez même comment vous avez pu vous en passer.
Oubliez les câbles
Libérez votre ordinateur grâce à l'impression sans fil. Plus aucun câble ne vous fera trébucher et vous n'aurez plus à brancher et à débrancher les appareils pour trouver la bonne imprimante. Et mieux encore, une imprimante sans fil peut être partagée par plusieurs ordinateurs, vous permettant ainsi d'économiser sur le matériel et de réduire les coûts d'énergie. Libérez-vous de la contrainte des câbles et dites adieu aux fils emmêlés grâce au multifonction laser SCX-4729FW!

Dank des Ergebnissimulators können Sie jetzt sehen, wie viel gute Arbeit Sie für die Umwelt leisten. Die Simulation zeigt die Kohlendioxidbilanz sowie den Strom- und Papierverbrauch. Der Eco-Modus ist eine einfache und effektive Methode, Ihren Druckverbrauch im Auge zu behalten und sich sowie unserer Umwelt einen Gefallen zu tun! Eine Arbeitserleichterung mit Multitasking Produktivität steht in jedem Büro oder bei jeder professionellen Arbeitsgruppe an erster Stelle. Der sehr vielseitige, schnell druckende SCX-4729FW ist für Produktivität ausgelegt. Sie können jetzt bequem, einfach und schnell drucken, kopieren, scannen und faxen. Warum sollten Sie verschiedene Geräte im Büro aufstellen, wenn Sie nur ein vielseitiges Gerät benötigen: den 4-in-1 SCX-4729FW Laser-Multifunktionsdrucker. Besseres Arbeiten mit schneller Druckgeschwindigkeit Dank der CPU mit 533 MHz und dem Speicher mit 128 MB bietet Samsung schnelle Druckgeschwindigkeiten für große und kleine Dokumente. Durch die schnelle Druckgeschwindigkeit können Sie wichtige Arbeitsdokumente problemlos und mit hoher Qualität drucken, dabei die Produktivität im Büro steigern und die Arbeitsabläufe verbessern. Ein zuverlässiger und überlegener Drucker wie dieser wird schnell zum unerlässlichen Werkzeug und Sie werden sich fragen, wie die Geschäfte jemals ohne liefen. Kein Kabelsalat Befreien Sie Ihren PC von lästigen Kabeln durch kabelloses Drucken. Keine Kabel als Stolperfallen mehr und kein unnötiges Anschließen von Geräten / Kabeln. Außerdem kann ein kabelloser Drucker von vielen Computern genutzt werden: Sie sparen Ausgaben für Hardware sowie Stromkosten. Befreien Sie sich von Kabeln und dem Kabelwirrwarr mit dem WLAN-Laserdrucker SCX-4729FW. Ein toller Drucker mit niedrigem Geräuschpegel Dank der weitreichenden Erfahrung von Samsung arbeitet die neue Produktreihe der bedienerfreundlichen Drucker mit nur 50 Dezibel – ideal fürs Büro und unbeliebt bei unserer Konkurrenz. Im Standby liegt der Geräuschpegel bei 30 dBA, damit Kollegen nicht bereits vor dem Druckvorgang schreien müssen, um sich Gehör zu verschaffen. Sie müssen die Türen zum Gang nicht schließen, da der SCX-4729FW die anderen führenden Drucker bei jeder gedruckten Seiten in den Schatten stellt. Ideal für enge, stilvolle Ecken und viel genutzte Plätze Endlich sieht Ihr Schreibtisch mit einem Drucker cool und schön aus. Der Samsung SCX-4729FW Laserdrucker hat ein elegantes Gehäuse, das in jeden Arbeitsbereich passt. Die Abdeckung sieht schick und sauber aus und schützt gleichzeitig vor Staub. Verschönern Sie Ihren Schreibtisch mit Zubehör, das Ihnen bei der Arbeit hilft. Erfassen, was Ihnen ins Auge sticht Mit der Software AnyWeb Print von Samsung können Sie im Internet jagen und sammeln. Sie können mit dem SCX-4729FW einfach Inhalte von verschiedenen Internetseiten auswählen und zum späteren Drucken in einen speziellen Bereich in Ihrem Browserfenster ziehen – und dabei weiter surfen. Es ist eine einfache Möglichkeit, diese nützlichen Referenzpunkte und Ressourcen für Ihr großes Projekt oder nur zum Spaß zu sammeln, zu ordnen und zu bearbeiten, die Sie nur im Internet finden.

description-en_US-print:
The beautiful PIXMA MG5320 Wireless Inkjet Photo All-In-One delivers superior quality, versatility, and ease of use. Built-in Wi-Fi® technology allows you to easily print and scan wirelessly virtually anywhere around your house. Print gorgeous, borderless photos at home up to 8.5" x 11" size with a maximum print color resolution of 9600 x 2400 dpi3 and five individual ink tanks.

Have all new sorts of fun with your images by adding new effects like Fish Eye, Miniature, Toy Camera, Soft Focus and Blur Background before you print. Enjoy a new sphere of printing options as PIXMA Cloud Link lets you conveniently print pictures from online photo albums CANON iMAGE GATEWAY and Picasa as well as templates including seasonal stationary and calendars from a compatible Canon PIXMA Wireless All-in-One, all without a computer. With AirPrint, wirelessly print photos, emails, web pages and other documents without the need to install device drivers, saving time and making for a seamless user experience. Built-in Auto Duplex Printing allows you to automatically print on both sides of the paper and can help reduce paper usage and cost by up to 50%. The MG5320 also lets you print on your CD, DVD and Blu-ray Discs, and you can even turn your HD Movie clips into beautiful photos.

View beautiful, easy-to-view scans by advanced image analysis and area-by-area data correction, automatically. Plus, you can print and scan JPEG and PDF files wirelessly from compatible iPad, iPhone, iPod touch, and Android devices4 without a computer. And, enjoy direct printing options from compatible memory cards5, USB Flash Drives6, PictBridge and optional Bluetooth devices.

name: Canon PIXMA MG5320

description-en_US-print:
As a small business you need all-round performance at the lowest possible cost. That’s what Ricohgives you with the multifunctional Aficio™SP 1200S/SP 1200SF. It prints, copies, scans and faxes(Aficio™SP 1200SF) from one compact, desktop unit. It delivers professional document quality and effortless usability. Above all, the Aficio™SP 1200S/SP 1200SF are as flexible and efficient as you have to be - day in, day out.
  • High productivity (22 ppm)
  • Space-saving footprint
  • Professional results
  • Colour scanning
  • Easy maintenance
description-en_US-mobile: Compact multifunctionality
name: Ricoh Aficio™SP 1200S

description-fr_FR-print: Excellente qualité Destiné aux néophytes, étudiants et familles, ce multifonction compact est idéal pour les impressions, numérisations et copies du quotidien. Le système de cartouches FINE de Canon à gouttes d'encre de 2 pl minimum et la résolution d'impression maximale de 4 800 dpi garantissent des impressions de qualité professionnelle quasiment exemptes de grain et des textes à la netteté irréprochable. Réduisez vos coûts d'impression avec les cartouches XL FINE en option. Impressions rapides à la maison Imprimez rapidement vos documents à des vitesses ESAT ISO de 9,2 ipm en noir et blanc et 5 ipm en couleur. Produisez des tirages éclatants de qualité professionnelle au format 10 x 15 cm sans marge en 44 secondes environ*. Connectivité améliorée Le Wi-Fi intégré facilite le partage à la maison. Imprimez directement depuis des périphériques mobiles et envoyez-leur directement des numérisations grâce à l'application Easy-PhotoPrint. Compact et simple d'utilisation Grâce au système FastFront, le chargement du papier et le remplacement de l'encre s'effectuent facilement à l'avant de l'appareil, ce qui réduit également l'encombrement. Ce design compact permet de placer l'appareil plus près du mur ou sur une étagère. Fonctions économiques Imprimez automatiquement en recto verso pour réduire votre consommation de papier et préserver l'environnement sans transiger sur la qualité de vos impressions. La fonction ECO Information vous informe des économies de CO2 et de papier réalisées grâce aux impressions recto verso. Économisez de l'énergie avec la fonction de mise hors tension automatique : réglez le délai de mise hors tension de l'imprimante en cas d'inactivité. Des logiciels intelligents Créez de magnifiques impressions à partir de films avec le logiciel Full HD Movie Print de Canon. Les nouvelles fonctions incluent la fusion des images et l'impression avec mise en page, pour des images encore plus saisissantes. Appliquez des effets de filtre amusants à vos photos avec Easy-PhotoPrint EX. Utilisez Easy-WebPrint EX pour combiner des éléments de plusieurs pages Web, ce qui vous permet d'imprimer seulement ce dont vous avez besoin sur Internet. Exprimez votre créativité avec CREATIVE PARK PREMIUM, un service en ligne qui vous permet de télécharger des photos, illustrations, maquettes papier et bien d'autres articles proposés par des photographes et artistes de renommée mondiale**. Des photos belles et durables Le système ChromaLife100 garantit des photos d'une beauté et d'une longévité extraordinaires. Utilisez avec le multifonction PIXMA MG3150 les encres et les papiers photo Canon d'origine, et vos souvenirs resteront à jamais intacts***. * Voir caractéristiques. ** Connexion Internet nécessaire *** Rendez-vous sur www.canon-europe.com/chromalife100 pour en savoir plus.
description-fr_FR-mobile: 4800 x 1200dpi, 5/9.2 ipm, A4, Flatbed, CIS 1200 x 2400 dpi, LED, USB, 802.11 b/g/n, 5.5kg
description-en_US-print: Excellent quality Perfect for first time buyers, students and families, this compact All-In-One is ideal for everyday printing, scanning and copying. Canon’s class leading FINE cartridge system using minimum 2pl ink droplet size combined with a print resolution of up to 4800dpi delivers smooth, virtually grain free photo-lab quality prints and crisp text. Lower your printing cost by using optional XL FINE cartridges. Quick printing for the home Print your documents quickly with ISO ESAT speeds of 9.2 ipm for mono documents and 5.0 ipm for colour. A vivid photo-lab quality 10x15cm borderless print is produced in approximately 44 seconds. Enhanced connectivity In-built Wi-Fi makes it easy to share in the home. Print from and scan directly to mobile devices using the Easy-PhotoPrint App. Easy to use and compact Benefiting from the FastFront feature, loading paper and replacing ink can now be done easily from the front and as a result has a more compact design. This allows the All-In-One to be placed closer to the wall or on a shelf - taking up less space. Eco features Use Auto Duplex Print for automatic double-sided printing to reduce your paper consumption and help the environment - all without comprising on print quality. With ECO Information you can see your CO2 and paper savings made by double-sided printing. Save energy by using the Auto Power Off - set the printer to switch off, when not being used for a set amount of time. Intelligent software Turn your movie moments into beautiful prints with Canon’s unique Full HD Movie Print. New features include Merge Frames and Layout Print to create more striking images. Make your photos even more exciting by applying Fun Filter Effects with Easy-PhotoPrint EX. For easy web printing use Easy-WebPrint EX, combine clips from several web pages so you only print what you need from the web. Get creative with CREATIVE PARK PREMIUM an online service that lets you download photos, illustrations, paper crafts and much more, from internationally recognised photographers & artists. Long lasting, beautiful photos The ChromaLife100 system provides long lasting, beautiful photos. The combination of the PIXMA MG3150, original Canon inks and genuine Canon photo papers preserves memories for a lifetime.
description-en_US-mobile: 4800 x 1200dpi, 5/9.2 ipm, A4, Flatbed, CIS 1200 x 2400 dpi, LED, USB, 802.11 b/g/n, 5.5kg
description-de_DE-print: Herausragende Qualität Dieses kompakte Multifunktionssystem eignet sich hervorragend für das tägliche Drucken, Scannen und Kopieren und ist ideal für Erstkäufer, Studenten und Familien. Canons exzellentes FINE-Druckkopfsystem vereint Mikrodüsen für bis zu 2 pl feine Tintentröpfchen mit einer Druckauflösung von bis zu 4.800 dpi und bietet so hochwertige Drucke in Laborqualität mit sanften Abstufungen ohne Körnung und gestochen scharfem Text. Wirtschaftliches Drucken Um die Druckkosten zu senken, kann der MG3150 mit optional erhältlichen XL-Patronen ausgerüstet werden, was eine Ersparnis von bis zu 50 % mit sich bringt (im Vergleich zu den Standardpatronen). Schnelles Drucken für zu Hause Drucken Sie Ihre Dokumente mit einer Geschwindigkeit von ca. 9,2 ISO-Seiten/Minute in Schwarzweiß und ca. 5,0 ISO-Seiten/Minute in Farbe. Ein 10 x 15 cm Randlosprint ist in nur ca. 44 Sekunden in klarer Laborqualität gedruckt.* Umfangreiche Anschlussmöglichkeiten Dank des integrierten LAN und WLAN können Sie sich das System problemlos mit Mehreren teilen. Die App Easy-PhotoPrint ermöglicht es Ihnen, direkt über Ihr WLAN Netz von Ihrem Mobilgerät zu drucken und sogar Scans an dieses zu senden. Einfach zu verwenden und kompakt Dank der neuen Frontbedienung können Sie nun problemlos von vorne Papier zuführen und die 2 Tintenpatronen austauschen. Dadurch kann das Multifunktionssystem nun näher an der Wand oder auf einem Regal platziert werden und hilft so, Platz zu sparen. Umweltfreundlich Verwenden Sie den Duplexdruck für automatischen beidseitigen Druck, um Ihren Papierverbrauch zu reduzieren und Ihren Beitrag zum Umweltschutz zu leisten, ohne Abstriche bei der Druckqualität zu machen. Mit der Funktion „ECO Information“ erfahren Sie, wie viel CO2 und Papier Sie durch beidseitigen Druck einsparen. Sparen Sie Strom durch die automatische Stromabschaltung: Stellen Sie den Drucker so ein, dass er sich ausschaltet, wenn er während des vorher festgelegten Zeitraums nicht benutzt wird. Intelligente Software Mit Canons einzigartigem Full HD Movie Print haben Sie dieMöglichkeit, Ihre schönsten Momente, die Sie mit einer Canon Digitalkamera gefilmt haben, in brillante Fotodrucke zu verwandeln. Zu den neuen Funktionen gehören unter anderem Einzelbilder überlagern (Merge Frames) und Layout Print, um noch eindrucksvollere Ausdrucke zu erhalten. Gestalten Sie Ihre Bilder mit Fun Filter-Effekten (z.B. Fischaugeneffekt) sogar noch aufregender mit dem neuen Easy-PhotoPrint EX. Mit Easy-WebPrint EX können Sie mühelos Webseiten aus dem Internet Explorer oder Safari drucken: Kombinieren Sie Ausschnitte von mehreren Webseiten, sodass Sie nur das drucken, was Sie wirklich wollen. Lassen Sie Ihrer Kreativität freien Lauf mit CREATIVE PARK PREMIUM, einem Online-Service, über den Sie Fotos, Bilder, Bastelvorlagen und vieles mehr von international anerkannten Fotografen und Künstlern herunterladen und drucken können.** Brillante Fotos mit hoher Farbstabilität ChromaLife100 für brillante Fotos mit besonders hoher Farbstabilität Die Kombination aus PIXMA MG3150, Canon Originaltinten und Canon Originalfotopapier sorgt für brillante Fotos mit hoher Farbstabilität, die lange halten.*** * Siehe technische Daten ** Erfordert Internetanschluss *** Weitere Details finden Sie unter www.canon.de/chromalife100.
description-de_DE-mobile: 4800 x 1200dpi, 5/9.2 ipm, A4, Flatbed, CIS 1200 x 2400 dpi, LED, USB, 802.11 b/g/n, 5.5kg
name: Canon PIXMA MG3150

description-fr_FR-print: Le PIXMA MG5350 est un multifonction photo avancé avec 5 réservoirs d'encre individuels, connexion Wi-Fi et impression recto verso automatique. L'interface intuitive dotée du système Quick Operation et l'écran TFT de 7,5 cm permettent d'accéder rapidement à la fonction souhaitée. Caractéristiques - Multifonction avancé - Système Quick Operation - 5 réservoirs d'encre individuels, résolution jusqu'à 9600 dpi, 1 pl minimum - Vitesse ESAT ISO de 12,5 ipm en noir et blanc/9,3 ipm en couleur - Photo 10 × 15 cm en 20 secondes environ - Wi-Fi - Recto verso automatique et impression directe sur disques - Full HD Movie Print - PIXMA Cloud Link Multifonction photo haute qualité extrêmement polyvalent avec connexion Wi-Fi, idéal pour une utilisation à la maison La qualité professionnelle à la maison Ce multifonction à 5 réservoirs d'encre est idéal pour ceux qui souhaitent bénéficier de fonctionnalités avancées et d'une qualité d'impression élevée. Avec ses gouttelettes d'encre de 1 pl minimum, la technologie de têtes d'impression FINE de Canon assure une résolution d'impression maximale de 9600 dpi, pour des photos exceptionnelles au dégradé irréprochable et des images noir et blanc exemptes de grain. Obtenez des tirages de qualité professionnelle au format 10 × 15 cm sans marge en 20 secondes environ grâce aux impressionnantes vitesses ESAT ISO de 12,5 ipm en noir et blanc et 9,3 ipm en couleur*. Fonctionnement simple Doté d'un écran TFT couleur de 7,5 cm, le panneau de commande centralisé est très intuitif. Grâce à son système Quick Operation, vous accédez rapidement à la fonction souhaitée. Design sophistiqué Compact et bénéficiant d'une élégante finition noire, cet appareil saura trouver sa place dans votre intérieur. Connectivité améliorée Le Wi-Fi intégré facilite le partage à la maison. Imprimez directement depuis des périphériques mobiles et envoyez-leur directement des numérisations grâce à l'application Easy-PhotoPrint. La prise en charge d'Apple AirPrint* vous permet d'imprimer directement depuis votre iPad ou votre iPhone. Impression en cloud Parcourez les photos préférées de vos albums en ligne sur CANON iMAGE GATEWAY** et Google Picasa et envoyez-les directement sur l'imprimante. Accédez à des calendriers, articles de papeterie et autres modèles à la demande sans ordinateur***. Gestion des supports polyvalente Profitez de la polyvalence avec l'impression recto verso automatique, pour imprimer les deux faces d'une feuille, et la double alimentation papier, qui vous permet de charger du papier standard et photo en même temps. Imprimez directement sur des CD, DVD et Blu-ray® compatibles avec l'impression directe sur disques. Fonctions économiques La fonction ECO Information vous informe sur les économies de CO2 et de papier réalisées via l'impression recto verso. Économisez de l'énergie avec la fonction de mise hors tension automatique : réglez le délai de mise hors tension de l'imprimante en cas d'inactivité. Logiciels avancés Créez de magnifiques impressions à partir de films avec le logiciel Full HD Movie Print de Canon. Les nouvelles fonctions incluent la fusion des images et l'impression avec mise en page, pour des images encore plus saisissantes. Appliquez des effets de filtre amusants à vos photos avec Easy-PhotoPrint EX. Utilisez Easy-WebPrint EX pour combiner des éléments de plusieurs pages Web, ce qui vous permet d'imprimer seulement ce dont vous avez besoin sur Internet. Exprimez votre créativité avec CREATIVE PARK PREMIUM, un service en ligne qui vous permet de télécharger des photos, illustrations, maquettes papier et bien d'autres articles proposés par des photographes et artistes de renommée mondiale***. * Voir caractéristiques. ** Selon disponibilité. *** Connexion Internet nécessaire.
