description-en_US-print: Get fast and high performance laser printing, faxing, copying and colour scanning in one robust unit. Built-in networking and PCL5e/6 compatibility make it ideal for sharing multifunctional resources. Features -Network ready Laser All-in-One: print, fax, copy, colour scan. -22 ppm/cpm, 1200 x 600 dpi print resolution (enhanced). -PCL5e, PCL6 compatibility. -Super G3 fax modem. -50-page Duplex Automatic Document Feeder. Network ready, super business centre. One solution for all your business needs Let one compact and robust unit handle all your workgroup business needs fast and efficiently. Benefit from productive laser printing, faxing, copying and colour scanning. Share printing resources with built-in networking, direct from all connected PCs. Cut investment costs considerably and save on office space. High speed, high quality laser output Print and copy at 22 pages per minute with high quality laser output. A 1200 x 600 dpi enhanced print resolution delivers perfect results for both text and graphics. Start printing straight away as there is virtually no warm-up time with Canon’s On-Demand fixing technology. Convenient PCL compatibility The i-SENSYS MP6580PL features PCL5e and PCL6 compatibility in addition to Canon’s printer language UFR-II LT. This ensures seamless and hassle-free working in your existing network environment. Fast and professional faxing The Super G3 fax modem sends faxes at a fast 3 seconds per page* to cut your communication costs. A 1280-page* fax memory stores incoming faxes safely if paper or toner runs out. Canon’s Ultra High Quality technology ensures that all details come out clearly when sending a combination of diagrams, photos and text. Timesaving features Timesaving features enhance ease of use and productivity. The 50-page Duplex Automatic Document Feeder speeds up double-sided printing and copying. Even fax lengthy documents without the need to split them up first. A standard 500-sheet paper cassette and 100-sheet multi purpose tray meets your paper demands adequately. For heavy-duty use an optional 500-sheet cassette is available. Superb colour scanning Scan colour documents and photos directly to a PDF format or email. A 600 x 600 dpi optical scanning resolution with up to 9600 x 9600 dpi enhanced resolution ensures maximum detail. The USB2.0 Hi-Speed interface speeds up image transmission between your multifunctional and PC. All-in-One cartridge Simply replace the All-in-One cartridge, containing toner and all essential parts, and your i-SENSYS MF6580PL is as good as new. Switch cartridges in seconds and benefit from continuous high quality output.
description-en_US-mobile: i-SENSYS MF6580PL Laser All-in-One: print, fax, copy, colour scan, 22 ppm/cpm, 1200 x 600 dpi
description-de_DE-print: Der i-SENSYS MF6580PL ist ein vielseitiges Multifunktionssystem zum Drucken, Kopieren, Scannen und Faxen mit Duplexfunktionalität. Dank integrierter Netzwerkkarte und PCL5e/6 Kompatibilität ist er geradezu für den LAN-Einsatz prädestiniert. Features -Laser-Multifunktionssystem mit Drucker, Kopierer, Scanner und Fax Integrierte Netzwerkkarte. -Druck-/Kopiergeschwindigkeit: 22 Seiten/Minute. -Integrierte Duplexeinheit für den doppelseitigen Druck. -Kompatibel zu PCL5e und PCL6. -Automatischer Dokumenteneinzug für bis zu 50 Seiten (mit Duplexfunktion). -Super G3 Faxmodem . Business-Center mit eigener Netzwerkkarte Vielseitige Business-Lösung Der i-SENSYS MF6580PL mit integrierter Netzwerkkarte ist ein kompaktes, robustes Multifunktionssystem zur schnellen und effizienten Umsetzung der Anforderungen anspruchsvoller Arbeitsgruppen. Ob Laserdrucker, Laserkopierer, Farbscanner oder Laserfax - der produktive MF6580PL bietet große Leistung auf kleiner Stellfläche. Die integrierte Duplexeinheit und der automatische Dokumenteneinzug (ADF) mit Duplexfunktion ermöglichen doppelseitige Kopien in einem Durchgang. Tempo und Qualität Als Drucker bzw. Kopierer überzeugt der i-SENSYS MF6580PL nicht nur durch hochwertige Laserqualität, sondern auch durch die hohe Geschwindigkeit von 22 Seiten pro Minute. 1.200 x 600 dpi Druckauflösung (interpoliert) bedeuten ausgezeichnete Resultate für Textdokumente und Grafiken gleichermaßen. Und dank Canons On-Demand Fixiertechnologie druckt dieser schnelle Allrounder ohne Vorwärmzeit aus dem Standby-Modus. Drucken im Netzwerk Der i-SENSYS MF6580PL besitzt eine integrierte Netzwerkkarte und ist sowohl zu PCL5e und PCL6 als auch zur Canon Druckersprache UFR-II LT (Ultra Fast Rendering) kompatibel. Damit ist er - ohne optionales Zubehör - für den direkten Einsatz im lokalen Netzwerk (LAN) vorbereitet. Schnelles und professionelles Fax Das Super G3 Faxmodem mit einer Übertragungsgeschwindigkeit von 3 Sekunden pro Seite* steht für wirtschaftlichen Faxverkehr. Besonders praktisch ist der große Faxspeicher für bis zu 1.280 Seiten*, der eingehende Faxe bei erschöpftem Papier- oder Tonervorrat für die spätere Ausgabe aufbewahrt. Canons UHQ-Technologie (Ultra High Quality) sorgt für die gestochen scharfe Wiedergabe der Vorlagen, sogar bei einer Kombination aus Grafiken, Fotos und Text. Zeit und Arbeit sparen Hoher Bedienkomfort und geringer Zeitaufwand für hohe Produktivität: Der i-SENSYS MF6580PL bietet einen automatischen Dokumenteneinzug für bis zu 50 Seiten mit integrierter Duplexfunktion für beidseitiges Drucken und Kopieren. Selbst umfangreiche Faxvorlagen können "in einem Rutsch" gesendet werden. Die Standard-Papierkassette für bis zu 500 Blatt und der Mehrzweckeinzug für bis zu 100 Blatt stehen für eine ergiebige Papierkapazität, die sich über die optional im Handel erhältliche zusätzliche 500-Blatt-Kassette sogar noch erweitern lässt - damit Sie auch bei intensiver Beanspruchung nicht ständig Papier nachlegen müssen. Farbiges Scannen und mehr Qualitätsarbeit liefert der i-SENSYS MF6580PL auch in seiner Eigenschaft als Farbscanner. So lassen sich beispielsweise farbige Dokumente und Fotos direkt ins PDF-Format konvertieren oder an eine E-Mail anhängen. Tempo spielt natürlich auch beim Scannen eine wichtige Rolle: Die USB2.0 Hi-Speed Schnittstelle sorgt für den schnellen Datentransfer zum PC. All-in-One Cartridge Die praktische All-in-One Cartridge 706 enthält neben dem Toner alle wichtigen Verschleißelemente. Vorteil: Nach dem Cartridgewechsel ist Ihr i-SENSYS MF6580PL wieder so gut wie neu. Mit wenigen Handgriffen sichern Sie sich lang anhaltende Qualität.
description-de_DE-mobile: i-SENSYS MF6580PL Laser All-in-One: print, fax, copy, colour scan, 22 ppm/cpm, 1200 x 600 dpi
name: Canon i-SENSYS MF6580PL

description-fr_FR-print: Mettez toutes les chances du côté de votre entreprise avec ce périphérique de bureau tout-en-un hautes performances, polyvalent et productif. Profitez d'une qualité d'impression professionnelle, de sorties rapides et d'une connectivité réseau Ethernet. Télécopie - Le modem télécopieur Super G3 envoie vos télécopies en noir et blanc et en couleur en seulement 3 secondes par page*. La numérotation est simple et rapide : 8 numérotations rapides 1 touche et 100 numérotations rapides codées vous permettent de stocker vos numéros récurrents. La mémoire de 250 pages* stocke en toute sécurité les télécopies entrantes en cas de manque d'encre ou de papier, en vue d'une impression ultérieure. Efficacité professionnelle - Le chargeur automatique de documents recto verso de 35 pages accroît la productivité en permettant la numérisation et la copie par lots. L'impression recto verso automatique réduit les dépenses en papier. Personnalisez vos CD/DVD imprimables jet d'encre et imprimez directement sur leur surface. Utilisez le logiciel CD-LabelPrint pour ajouter du texte et des images mis en page. Deux bacs papier contiennent le papier photo et le papier ordinaire. Le Démarrage rapide permet d'utiliser toutes les fonctions en un instant. Impression de documents - Imprimez jusqu'à 31 ppm en noir et blanc et 24 ppm en couleur. Copie - Copiez jusqu'à 31 cpm en noir et blanc et 24 cpm en couleur. La technologie de copie avancée vous garantit une qualité chromatique exceptionnelle. Numérisation - La résolution 4 800 ppp garantit de superbes numérisations couleur. Numérisez directement vers un ordinateur, un message électronique ou au format PDF. Le logiciel MP Navigator EX facilite l'opération.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Pixma MX850
description-en_US-print: Give your business a boost with this high performance, versatile and productive Office All-In-One. Benefit from professional print quality, high speed output and Ethernet network connectivity. - Super G3 fax - 5 Single Inks - 35-page Duplex ADF - Ethernet connectivity - Print/copy, mono/colour, up to 31/24ppm - Scan at 4800dpi - Print photos with 1pl, 9600x2400dpi - 6.2cm colour TFT display - Quick Start - Duplex print/copy - CD/DVD print Giving more power to small businesses Faxing The Super G3 fax modem sends your mono and colour faxes fast, in as little as 3 seconds per page. Dialling is quick and simple with 8 one-touch and 100 coded speed dials to store regular numbers. The 250-page fax memory safely stores all incoming faxes if paper or ink runs out, for printing out later. Office efficiency The 35-page Duplex Automatic Document Feeder increases productivity by enabling batch scanning and copying. Automatic duplexing cuts paper costs. Personalise inkjet-printable CD/DVDs by printing straight onto the surface. Use CD-LabelPrint software to add layout text and images. Two paper trays hold both photo and plain paper. Quick Start allows almost instant use of functions. Document printing Print documents at up to 31ppm in mono or 24ppm in colour. Copying Copy at up to 31cpm in mono or 24cpm in colour. Advanced copy technology ensures exceptional colour performance. Scanning 4800dpi resolution delivers superb colour scans. Scan straight to PC, email or PDF. MP Navigator EX software makes operation easy. Accurate Optical Character Recognition software converts printed text into editable electronic documents. Photo printing Enjoy superior quality photo prints with fine detail and smooth colour gradations thanks to tiny 1pl ink droplets and a high 9600x2400dpi print resolution. Print a 10x15cm borderless photo in approx. 21 seconds in Standard Mode. Print photos directly from your memory card and PictBridge-ready digital camera or camcorder. Auto Image Fix automatically enhances your photos. Apply Red Eye Removal, face brightening and more with the image editing software. ChromaLife100 delivers beautiful, long-lasting prints with longevity up to 100 years. Interface The crystal clear 6.2cm TFT screen makes PC-free operation easy. View, select, edit and print at a touch. Single Inks All 5 Single Ink tanks can be replaced separately, minimising ink wastage and maximising savings. A smart LED light flashes to alert you when a colour is running low or needs replacement. Connectivity Integrate this PIXMA into your Ethernet network and all connected users can share the productive fax, print, copy and scan functions, saving time and money. Operating systems Windows and Mac OS X compatible.
description-en_US-mobile: Pixma MX850
description-de_DE-print: Das vielseitige, leistungsstarke, effiziente Multifunktionssystem für profitable Geschäfte. Professionell aussehende Druckqualität, hohes Drucktempo und Ethernet-Schnittstelle. Faxen - Faxe in Schwarzweiß oder Farbe – das Super G3-Faxmodem sorgt für schnellen Faxversand. Das Wählen geht dank der 8 Zielwahl- und 100 Kurzwahlspeicher für regelmäßig angewählte Gegenstellen schnell und einfach. Der Faxspeicher ist für bis zu 250 Seiten* ausgelegt. So können Dokumente, wenn Papier oder Tinte ausgehen, auch später gedruckt werden. Effizientes Büro - Erhöhte Produktivität garantiert der automatische Dokumenteneinzug für bis zu 35 Seiten mit Duplexfunktion. Das ermöglicht das Scannen und Kopieren von doppelseitigen Vorlagen in einem Rutsch. Der automatische Duplexdruck senkt die Papierkosten. Gestalten Sie individuelle bedruckbare CDs/DVDs, indem Sie direkt auf deren Oberfläche drucken. Mit der Software CD-LabelPrint können Sie Layouts mit Text und Bildern hinzufügen. Der PIXMA MX850 hat zwei Papierfächer für z. B. die separate Bevorratung mit Foto- und Normalpapier. Per Quick Start stehen alle Funktionen in wenigen Sekunden nach dem Einschalten zur Verfügung. Druck von Dokumenten - Drucken von Dokumenten mit einer Geschwindigkeit von bis zu 31 Seiten/Minute (Schwarzweiß) oder 24 Seiten/Minute (Farbe). Kopieren - Erstellen von Kopien mit einer Geschwindigkeit von bis zu 31 Seiten/Minute (Schwarzweiß) oder 24 Seiten/Minute (Farbe). Innovative Kopiertechnologien sorgen für eine außergewöhnliche Farbreproduktion. Scannen - Die Sensorauflösung von 4.800 dpi liefert detailreiche Farbscans von der Vorlagenfläche. Mit Scan-to-PC, -to-PDF, -to-Email stehen diverse, für den Büroalltag wichtige Scanfunktionen zur Verfügung. Die Software MP Navigator EX sorgt für eine einfache Bedienung. Die mitgelieferte OCR-Software (Optical Character Recognition) zur Texterkennung wandelt gedruckten Text in editierbare Dokumente um. Fotodruck - Mit bis zu 1 Picoliter feinen Tintentröpfchen und einer Druckauflösung von bis zu 9.600 x 2.400 dpi* druckt der PIXMA MX850 Fotoprints in Laborqualität mit hoher Detailpräzision und sanften Farbübergängen. Drucken von randlosen Fotos im Format 10 x 15 cm in ca. 21 Sekunden im Standardmodus*. Fotodirektdruck von Speicherkarten, PictBridge-kompatiblen Digitalkameras oder Camcordern. Optional als Zubehör ist im Handel ein neuer Bluetooth Adapter BU-30 erhältlich. Auto Image Fix optimiert automatisch Ihre Fotos vor dem Druck. Die Bildbearbeitungssoftware bietet unter anderem Rote-Augen-Korrektur und Hauttonkorrektur. ChromaLife100** sorgt für brillante Fotoprints mit einer Farbstabilität von bis zu 100 Jahren. Schnittstelle - Über das 6,2 cm große TFT-Display ist eine ganz bequeme Bedienung des Multifunktionssystems auch ohne PC möglich. Anzeigen, Auswählen, Bearbeiten und Drucken auf Knopfdruck. Single Ink-Technologie - Alle fünf Single Ink-Tintentanks können einzeln ausgetauscht werden. Dies führt zu einer optimalen Nutzung der Tinten und senkt den Kostenaufwand. Eine intelligente LED blinkt, wenn die Farbe zur Neige geht oder ersetzt werden muss. Anschlussmöglichkeiten - Der PIXMA MX850 lässt sich in ein Ethernet-Netzwerk integrieren. So haben alle angeschlossenen Benutzer den Zugriff auf die effizienten Funktionen zum Faxversenden, Drucken und Scannen. Betriebssysteme - Windows- und Mac OS X-kompatibel. * siehe Technische Daten ** siehe www.canon.de/chromalife100
description-de_DE-mobile: Pixma MX850
name: Canon PIXMA MX850

description-en_US-print: This compact network-ready All-in-One offers small offices productive laser printing, faxing, copying and colour scanning. Cut paper costs and create professional documents with double-sided printing. Features - Print, fax, copy, colour scan - Built-in network interface - Super G3 fax modem - Auto duplexing - Zero warm-up time from sleep mode - First Copy Out Time in less than 9 seconds - 20 ppm/cpm, up to 1200x600dpi print resolution - 35-sheet Automatic Document Feeder Network ready, compact Laser All-in-One for small offices Space-saving productivity This stylish multifunctional is the ideal solution for small offices that want to boost productivity and save on space. Benefit from professional print, fax, copy and colour scan functionality in a compact desktop unit. Easy network connectivity Share printing and PC faxing thanks to the built-in network interface card. A Remote User Interface allows users to view machine status and monitor print jobs from their web browser. Also administrators can control machine settings. Fast, high quality faxing The Super G3 fax modem transmits faxes in as little as 3 seconds per page* to cut your communication costs. The 256-page* fax memory stores faxes safely if paper or toner runs out. Scan documents to memory before transmission to save time. Our Ultra High Quality imaging technology ensures that all details come out clearly when sending documents containing diagrams, photos or fine text. Cut paper costs Cut paper costs and produce professional looking documents and booklets with built-in automatic double-sided printing. Save time, save energy Speed up your workflow. With virtually zero warm-up time from sleep mode, and a First Copy Out Time of less than 9 seconds, there no waiting for prints or copies. Save on power costs too as this energy efficient unit uses only 3 watts in sleep mode. High speed, high quality output Print and copy large multi-page documents with ease thanks to a rapid 20 ppm/cpm print speed. Up to 1200 x 600dpi print resolution provides high quality output, with sharp text and clear graphics. 35-sheet Automatic Document Feeder Copy, fax and scan multiple page documents quickly and with ease using the 35-sheet Automatic Document Feeder. A 250-sheet paper tray and multi purpose tray offer flexible paper handling. Versatile colour scanning The user-friendly MF toolbox software allows quick access to various colour scan functions including scan to pdf and scan to email. Convert paper documents into digital documents using the bundled OCR software. All-in-One cartridge The All-in-One cartridge reduces maintenance requirements and ensures continuous high quality output. Simply replace the compact cartridge - containing toner, drum and cleaning units - and the printer is almost as good as 'new'.
description-en_US-mobile: I-Sensys MF4270 MFP 20PPM 32MB
name: Canon i-SENSYS MF4270

description-en_US-print: For small businesses or workgroups requiring print, copy and scan functionality the MB461 is a robust MFP with outstanding features that add control. In addition, with a low initial capital outlay and low running costs, this is an attractive option for the budget conscious business. Fast, reliable and easy to use - Print speeds of 33ppm for time critical print jobs - Built on tried and tested, award winning digital LED technology - Ideal for use by a wide range of organisations thanks to its flexible media handling, from labels to spreadsheets, invoices, proposals, forms, technical drawings and more - Perfect for businesses that require fast mono printing with the added functionality of copying, scanning and faxing Great features to improve workplace productivity The MB461 is packed full of outstanding standard features, including: - 50-sheet RADF enabling you to copy, scan and fax two sided documents - Front facing USB port enabling you to directly print from a USB stick - Overlay function enables you to save logos or forms in the MFP memory, for re-use in other documents - Compatible with mobile printing applications allowing you to print directly from your mobile device over wireless networks Looking after the environment The MB461 is one of the most environmentally conscious A4 mono MFPs on the market, incorporating a wide range of features to help your organisation reduce its energy consumption, impact on the environment and ongoing costs.: - Reduced energy usage through combining several devices in one - Advanced LED technology - Eco and Deep Sleep modes - Reduced toner usage with a Toner Save function, Duplex printing and advanced fax functionality that helps to reduce the amount you print Plus, extra peace of mind We are so confident in the reliability of the MB461 you can benefit from OKI’s 3 year warranty at no extra cost by registering your product within 30 days of purchase.
description-en_US-mobile: The 3-in-1 A4 mono device for small businesses or workgroups, 2400x600dpi, 33ppm, 330MHz, 256MB, 50,000 pages/month, Fast Ethernet, 20kg
name: OKI MB461

description-en_US-print: - A4 Mono 3-in-1 MFP, 1-5 users - 29ppm print speed and 5 seconds to first page print - RADF and duplex as standard - 251 sheet maximum paper capacity - PCL printer language emulation The MB441 is the perfect device for a micro business or home office with low usage and print volume requirements and where space is at a premium. With print speeds of 28ppm and a user friendly graphical LCD display, along with one touch buttons, you can now access print, copy and scan functionality in one compact device. And, if budgets are tight, with a low initial capital outlay, the MB441 is the ideal choice. Fast, reliable and easy to use The MB441 A4 multifunctional mono printer is built on tried and tested, award winning digital LED technology, delivering a new standard in mono multifunction versatility in the workplace. Thanks to its flexible media handling, the MB441 can print many document types from labels to spreadsheets, invoices, proposals, forms, technical drawings and more, making it ideal for use by a wide range of organisations and workgroups across sectors such as retail, hospitality, construction, financial and healthcare. In fact, it is perfect for any organisation that requires fast mono printing with the added functionality of copying and scanning. Great features to improve workplace productivity The MB441 is packed full of outstanding utilities, eco functions and standard features, including a 50-sheet RADF enabling you to copy and scan two sided documents, helping to reduce costs and your carbon footprint, and a front facing USB port enabling you to directly print from a USB stick. Looking after the environment The MB441 is one of the most environmentally conscious A4 mono MFPs on the market, incorporating a wide range of features to help your organisation reduce its energy consumption, impact on the environment and ongoing costs. These include reduced energy usage through combining several devices in one, advanced LED technology, Eco and Deep Sleep modes, reduced toner usage with a Toner Save function and Duplex printing that helps to reduce the amount you print. Flexible media handling to optimise output With a multipurpose, manual feed tray, the MB441 can print on a wide range of media sizes and weights, from A6 to 1321mm and up to 160gsm, providing you with the added flexibility to print a wide range of documents in-house. Add to this automatic Duplex Printing, Copying and Scanning and an RADF as standard and you have a simple, efficient and cost effective method of handling double sided documents. Additionally, double sided ID cards can be scanned and printed to a single side of paper allowing you to view the ID card in full. Added functionality for managing your printing Manage and control your networked printers and MFPs with a powerful reporting structure, PrintSuperVision. This allows IT managers to manage devices and troubleshoot any problems without user intervention, providing complete control and visibility of all printers, regardless of make or model, across your network. Provide visibility and control of your organisation’s print spend with Print Job Accounting, a utility that allows you to restrict access to individuals or groups and manage printing and copying within defined cost limits. Print Job Accounting also provides you with the ability to report on usage across the network, capturing information on volume, paper size, media type and consumables usage. Plus, extra peace of mind We are so confident in the reliability of the MB441 you can benefit from OKI’s unique 3 year warranty at no extra cost by registering your product within 30 days of purchase.
description-en_US-mobile: The 3-in-1 device for the micro business or home office, 29ppm, 330MHz, 256MB, Fast Ethernet, USB 2.0, 30000 pages/month
name: OKI MB441

description-en_US-print: For small office or workgroups with demanding needs the MB471 is a robust, fast performance MFP with features that add support to your day-to-day requirements whilst reducing environmental impact and improving energy efficiency. For added versatility, the MB471w offers wireless connectivity, enabling wireless connection to the network, so your MFP can be placed anywhere in your office without the need for network ports. Fast, reliable and easy to use - Print speeds of 33ppm for time critical print jobs - Built on tried and tested, award winning digital LED technology - Ideal for use by a wide range of organisations thanks to its flexible media handling, from labels to spreadsheets, invoices, proposals, forms, technical drawings and more - Perfect for businesses that require fast mono printing with the added functionality of copying, scanning and faxing Great features to improve workplace productivity The MB471 is packed full of outstanding standard features, including: - 50-sheet RADF enabling you to copy, scan and fax two sided documents - QWERTY keypad for quick typing of email addresses - Front facing USB port enabling you to directly print from a USB stick - Overlay function enables you to save logos or forms in the MFP memory, for re-use in other documents - Compatible with mobile printing applications allowing you to print directly from your mobile device over wireless networks Looking after the environment The MB471 is one of the most environmentally conscious A4 mono MFPs on the market, incorporating a wide range of features to help your organisation reduce its energy consumption, impact on the environment and ongoing costs.: - Reduced energy usage through combining several devices in one - Advanced LED technology - Eco and Deep Sleep modes - Reduced toner usage with a Toner Save function, Duplex printing and advanced fax functionality that helps to reduce the amount you print Plus, extra peace of mind We are so confident in the reliability of the MB471 you can benefit from OKI’s 3 year warranty at no extra cost by registering your product within 30 days of purchase.
description-en_US-mobile: The 4-in-1 A4 mono device for small offices or workgroups, Print, Scan, Copy and Fax, 33ppm, 70,000 pages/month, 330MHz, 256MB, LCD panel, 20kg
name: OKI MB471

description-fr_FR-print: Le MB451 4-en-1 est parfaitement adapté aux attentes des micro-entreprises, professions libérales et travailleurs indépendants, qui ne recherchent pas des volumes d’impression élevés mais chez qui la compacité du produit est un critère déterminant. Avec sa vitesse d’impression de 28 ppm, son écran LCD convivial et ses touches dédiées, il réunit en un appareil compact les fonctions d’impression, de copie, et de numérisation. Et pour plus de souplesse, le MB451w offre une connectivité wifi, ce qui vous donne la possibilité de le placer n'importe où dans votre bureau sans vous préoccuper de savoir s'il y a des ports réseau disponibles. Et, si votre budget est serré, le MB441 est un choix idéal demandant un investissement peu élevé. Rapide, fiable et facile à utiliser Le multifonction A4 mono MB451 A4 est construit sur la base de la technologie LED OKI ultra-fiable et primée de nombreuses fois, offrant un nouveau standard en terme de polyvalence aux multifonctions mono sur le lieu de travail. Grâce à sa grande polyvalence dans la gestion des médias, le MB451 peut imprimer un grand nombre de documents, des étiquettes aux feuilles de calculs, devis, factures, propositions, dessins techniques et plus encore, ce qui en fait un appareil idéal pour bon nombre d'entreprises et organisations dans des secteurs variés comme le commerce de détail, l'hôtellerie , la construction, la finance et la santé. En fait, il est parfait dans toutes les entreprises qui ont besoin d'imprimer rapidement en monochrome avec en plus la possibilité de copier et de numériser des documents. Des fonctionnalités intéressantes pour améliorer la productivité Le MB451 est livré avec plusieurs utilitaires très pratiques, des fonctions écologiques et des caractéristiques avancées, dont un module recto verso automatique de 50 feuilles permettant de copier et de numériser les 2 faces d'un document en recto verso, contribuant ainsi à réduire les coûts et l'empreinte carbone, et un port USB frontal permettant d'imprimer directement à partir d'une clé USB. Prendre soin de l'environnement Le MB451 est l'un des multifonctions mono A4 les plus écoresponsables du marché. Il intègre en standard un large éventail de fonctionnalités pour aider les entreprises à réduire leur consommation d'énergie, leur impact environnemental et leurs coûts d'utilisation. Il s'agit notamment de la réduction de la consommation électrique grâce à l'association de plusieurs fonctions en 1 seul appareil, de la technologie de pointe LED, des modes Eco et veille profonde, de la fonction Toner Save qui permet de limiter l'usage du toner et de l'impression recto-verso qui réduit le total des impressions réalisées Gestion souple des médias pour optimiser la production Avec son bac multiformats, le MB451 peut imprimer sur un large éventail de papier de tailles et de grammages variés, du A6 aux bannières de 1321 mm et jusqu'à 160 g/m², apportant ainsi la possibilité et la souplesse nécessaire pour imprimer en interne de nombreux documents. Ajoutez à cela l'impression, la copie et la numérisation en recto-verso automatique en standard et vous avez une réponse simple, efficace et rentable pour gérer vos documents en recto-verso. En outre, vous pouvez également profiter de fonctionnalités très pratiques comme l'impression des cartes d'identité dont les 2 faces peuvent être scannées et imprimées sur le recto seul du papier, permettent de visualiser la carte d'identité dans son intégralité. Des fonctionnalités supplémentaires pour la gestion de vos impressions Gérez et contrôlez vos imprimantes et multifonctions en réseau avec un outil de reporting puissant, PrintSuperVision. Il permet aux responsables informatiques de gérer, par le biais du navigateur, les imprimantes présentes sur le réseau et de résoudre à distance les problèmes. Il offre un contrôle et une visibilité complète de toutes les imprimantes du réseau, quelle que soit leur marque. Print Job Accounting apporte visibilité et contrôle sur les dépenses d’impression de votre entreprise. Gagnez en visibilité sur vos coûts d’impression, contrôlez l’utilisation des imprimantes et multifonctions au sein de votre entreprise, limitez-en l’accès à des personnes ou à des groupes spécifiques, et gérez vos impressions et copies dans les limites budgétaires définies. Print Job Accounting vous donne aussi la possibilité de faire des rapports sur l’utilisation des systèmes d’impression du réseau, en capturant les informations sur les volumes d’impression, les tailles et les types de support utilisés et l’utilisation des consommables. Une totale tranquillité d'esprit Nous sommes tellement convaincus de la qualité, de la robustesse et de la fiabilité de nos produits que nous incluons une garantie de trois ans en standard, sous réserve d'enregistrement sur le site oki.fr/garantie dans les 30 jours suivant l'achat.
description-fr_FR-mobile: MB451 - A4 Mono 4-in-1 MFP, 29ppm mono, 600 x 600dpi, 330MHz, RAM: 245MB, Fax, LCD, Ethernet, USB 2.0

description-en_US-mobile: MB451 - A4 Mono 4-in-1 MFP, 29ppm mono, 600 x 600dpi, 330MHz, RAM: 245MB, Fax, LCD, Ethernet, USB 2.0
description-de_DE-print: Der 4-in-1-Multifunktionsdrucker für Kleinstunternehmen und Home-Offices. - Druckgeschwindigkeit: 29 Seiten pro Minute in Schwarzweiß - Zeit bis zum ersten Druck: 5 Sekunden in Schwarzweiß - Auflösung: 2.400 x 600 dpi, 1.200 x 600 dpi, 600 x 600 dpi - Papierfassungsvermögen: max. 350 Blatt - Papierformate: A4, A5, B5, A6, Briefumschläge, Etiketten, Umschläge, Banner bis 1.321 mm - Druckersprachen: PCL5e, PCL6, PostScript, SIDM - Schnittstellen: 10/100 TX Ethernet, USB 2.0 Device IF, USB 2.0 Host IF, WLAN (nur MB451w) Der OKI MB451 ist die perfekte Wahl für Kleinstunternehmen und Home-Offices mit niedrigen Nutzungs- und Druckvolumenanforderungen sowie beschränktem Platzangebot. Durch seine niedrigen Anschaffungskosten, die Druckgeschwindigkeit von bis zu 29 Seiten pro Minute, sein benutzerfreundliches LCD-Grafikdisplay sowie die One-Touch-Funktionstasten können Sie mit diesem kompakten Gerät nun selbst bei knappem Budget sowohl drucken, kopieren und scannen als auch Faxfunktionen nutzen. Und damit Sie es noch flexibler einsetzen können, verfügt das Modell OKI MB451w über eine drahtlose Verbindung (WLAN), so dass Sie Ihren Multifunktionsdrucker an jedem gewünschten Platz aufstellen können. Mit der Kombination aus 3 Jahren Garantie, Duplexdruck als Standard und einer flexiblen Medienhandhabung verfügt dieser MFP nicht nur über erweiterte Funktionalitäten, sondern liefert darüber hinaus herausragende Druckergebnisse.
description-de_DE-mobile: MB451 - A4 Mono 4-in-1 MFP, 29ppm mono, 600 x 600dpi, 330MHz, RAM: 245MB, Fax, LCD, Ethernet, USB 2.0
name: OKI MB451

description-en_US-print: OKI MB471/MB471w. Print technology: Laser, Printing: Mono, Copying: Mono. Maximum copy resolution: 600 x 600, Copier resize: 25 - 400. Optical scanning resolution: 600 x 600, Scan type: Flatbed. Modem speed: 33.6. ISO A-series sizes (A0...A9): A4, A5, A6, Maximum print size: A4 (210 x 297 mm), Standard tray media types: Plain paper
description-en_US-mobile: OKI MB471/MB471w, Laser, Mono, Mono, 600 x 600, 25 - 400, 600 x 600
description-de_DE-print: Der 4-in-1-Multifunktionsdrucker für Büros und Arbeitsgruppen. - Druckgeschwindigkeit: 33 Seiten pro Minute in Schwarzweiß - Zeit bis zum ersten Druck: 5 Sekunden in Schwarzweiß - Auflösung: 1.200 x 600 dpi, 600 x 600 dpi - Papierfassungsvermögen: max. 880 Blatt - Papierformate: A4, A5, B5, A6, Briefumschläge, Etiketten, Umschläge, Banner bis 1.321 mm - Druckersprachen: PCL5e, PCL6, PostScript, SIDM - Schnittstellen: 10/100 TX Ethernet, USB 2.0 Device IF, USB 2.0 Host IF, WLAN (nur MB471w) Der OKI MB471 bietet das Komplettpaket in einem Gerät: Drucken, Kopieren, Scannen und Faxen mit einer Druckauflösung von 1.200 dpi, Druckgeschwindigkeiten von bis zu 33 Seiten pro Minute und viele weitere zeit- und energiesparende Funktionen. Zusätzliche Flexibilität bietet der MB471w: Durch Verbindung mit Ihrem Drahtlosnetzwerk (WLAN) werden Netzwerkanschlüsse überflüssig. So können Sie Ihren Multifunktionsdrucker überall im Büro aufstellen. Mit der Kombination aus 3 Jahren Garantie, Duplexdruck als Standard und einer flexiblen Medienhandhabung verfügt dieses Gerät nicht nur über erweiterte Funktionalitäten, sondern liefert darüber hinaus herausragende Druckergebnisse und sorgt dank der reichweitenstarken Tonerkartuschen für günstige Betriebskosten.

description-de_DE-print:
Der 4-in-1-Multifunktionsdrucker für Kleinstunternehmen und Home-Offices.
- Druckgeschwindigkeit: 29 Seiten pro Minute in Schwarzweiß
- Zeit bis zum ersten Druck: 5 Sekunden in Schwarzweiß
- Auflösung: 2.400 x 600 dpi, 1.200 x 600 dpi, 600 x 600 dpi
- Papierfassungsvermögen: max. 350 Blatt
- Papierformate: A4, A5, B5, A6, Briefumschläge, Etiketten, Umschläge, Banner bis 1.321 mm
- Druckersprachen: PCL5e, PCL6, PostScript, SIDM
- Schnittstellen: 10/100 TX Ethernet, USB 2.0 Device IF, USB 2.0 Host IF, WLAN (nur MB451w)

Der OKI MB451 ist die perfekte Wahl für Kleinstunternehmen und Home-Offices mit niedrigen Nutzungs- und Druckvolumenanforderungen sowie beschränktem Platzangebot. Durch seine niedrigen Anschaffungskosten, die Druckgeschwindigkeit von bis zu 29 Seiten pro Minute, sein benutzerfreundliches LCD-Grafikdisplay sowie die One-Touch-Funktionstasten können Sie mit diesem kompakten Gerät nun selbst bei knappem Budget sowohl drucken, kopieren und scannen als auch Faxfunktionen nutzen. Und damit Sie es noch flexibler einsetzen können, verfügt das Modell OKI MB451w über eine drahtlose Verbindung (WLAN), so dass Sie Ihren Multifunktionsdrucker an jedem gewünschten Platz aufstellen können. Mit der Kombination aus 3 Jahren Garantie, Duplexdruck als Standard und einer flexiblen Medienhandhabung verfügt dieser MFP nicht nur über erweiterte Funktionalitäten, sondern liefert darüber hinaus herausragende Druckergebnisse.

description-en_US-print: For organisations with demanding needs the MB491 is a robust, fast and high performance MFP with features that add security and control whilst reducing the total cost of ownership through high capacity toner cartridges and energy efficient operation. Fast, reliable and easy to use - Print speeds of 40ppm for high volume print jobs the MB491 is one of the fastest A4 mono MFP devices available at this price point - Built on tried and tested, award winning digital LED technology - Ideal for use by a wide range of organisations thanks to its flexible media handling, from labels to spreadsheets, invoices, proposals, forms, technical drawings and more - Perfect for businesses that require fast mono printing with the added functionality of copying, scanning and faxing Great features to improve workplace productivity - The MB491 is packed full of outstanding standard features, including: - 50-sheet RADF enabling you to copy, scan and fax two sided documents - QWERTY keypad for quick typing of email addresses - Front facing USB port enabling you to directly print from a USB stick - Secure Print allows you to protect valuable corporate data - Auto delivery allows users to route faxes or emails from a specific sender to multiple pre-defined destinations - Compatible with mobile printing applications allowing you to print directly from your mobile device over wireless networks Looking after the environment The MB491 is one of the most environmentally conscious A4 mono MFPs on the market, incorporating a wide range of features to help your organisation reduce its energy consumption, impact on the environment and ongoing costs.: - Reduced energy usage through combining several devices in one - Advanced LED technology - Eco and Deep Sleep modes - Reduced toner usage with a Toner Save function, Duplex printing and advanced fax functionality that helps to reduce the amount you print Plus, extra peace of mind We are so confident in the reliability of the MB491 you can benefit from OKI’s 3 year warranty at no extra cost by registering your product within 30 days of purchase.
description-en_US-mobile: The 4-in-1 A4 mono device for larger corporations or workgroups, 80,000 pages/monthб 330MHz, Fast Ethernet, USB 2.0, 20kg
name: OKI MB491

description-en_US-print: The MC352dn offers professional quality and reliability for small businesses or workgroups that require print, scan and copy functionality. With colour print speeds of 22ppm and mono print speeds of 24ppm, the MC352dn provides the user with the flexibility to manage their documents in-house. The MC352dn offers Duplex printing, scanning and copying as standard, with an automatic RADF, combined with superior quality High Definition colour and mono A4 printing that enables you to produce professional looking documents in-house. Print smart, saving time and money through printing in-house Management and printing of your documents is so much simpler with the MC352dn, combining High Definition colour printing with tools that give you the ability to create a full range of documents in-house, allowing you to effectively manage what you print and when you print it. Sharp, accurate scanning with useful document management functionality Providing sharp, fast and accurate scanning, the MC352dn enables you to digitise your documents clearly and with ease. Scan directly to a USB or network TWAIN, whilst LDAP provides direct access to contact and email data from an existing directory server. Efficient and cost saving functionality The MC352dn is built on award winning digital LED technology that is inherently energy efficient with many features and functions that reduce your ongoing costs, including Eco mode, Deep Sleep mode and an Auto-Off mode that reduces energy consumption to 0.5W when not in use. Reliable printing with a 3-year warranty as standard OKI’s ultra-reliable, award winning digital LED technology has fewer moving parts, which means less wear and tear, for exceptional reliability. This, plus durable components and a robust, built-to-last design, allows us to provide users with the peace of mind of a 3-year warranty as standard.

description-en_US-print: Make a lasting impression with award-winning color The documents you print define an important image – yours. That’s why Lexmark color MFPs help businesses be more productive and stand out with vibrant color. With the ability to print professional quality color in-house, you can add instant impact and save costs by virtually eliminating the need to outsource print jobs. Lexmark also offers a host of color-access and control tools to manage cost. Eco-responsible Printing responsibly means everyone wins – your business, your budget and the environment. Lexmark’s award-winning products are designed for ease of use, high quality output and reliable performance, with innovative capabilities that help you minimize the number of cartridges you use over the life of the printer and conserve paper and energy. Our goal is to design, package and deliver innovative products and solutions in an environmentally responsible manner. The Lexmark Cartridge Collection Program is active around the world providing a variety of methods for free returns of your empties to Lexmark or our collection partners. Our goal: Make it easy to do the right thing.

description-fr_FR-print: Augmentez votre efficacité et imprimez depuis pratiquement n'importe où avec l'impression mobile et réseau sans fil. Faites-en davantage – imprimez, copiez, scannez et faxez – et produisez des documents couleur professionnels à un faible coût par page. Caractéristiques - Économisez jusqu'à 40 % d'énergie - préréglez la mise en marche et l'arrêt de votre périphérique à l'aide des options Schedule On (Programmer la mise en marche) et Schedule Off (Programmer l'arrêt). - Economisez du papier en affichant et en stockant les fax électroniquement. - Découvrez la liberté de HP ePrint et imprimez depuis n'importe où. - Partagez les ressources via le réseau sans fil ou connectez directement à votre PC avec le port USB haut débit. - Imprimez e-mails, documents, pages web et plus directement depuis votre iPad®, iPhone® ou iPod touch® avec AirPrint™. - Imprimez sans fil directement depuis un smartphone et d'autres appareils mobiles à l'aide des applications d'impression mobiles HP. - Profitez des possibilités d'impression, de copie, de scan et de télécopie aisées – scannez et faxez directement vers un PC ou des dossiers réseau. - Exploitez davantage votre temps - scannez, copiez ou faxez plusieurs documents à la fois à l'aide du chargeur automatique de documents de 35 pages. - Imprimez des documents de qualité à des vitesses ISO de jusqu'à 8 ppm en noir, 7,5 ppm en couleur. - Accès aux outils d'impression et de copie – et plus – via l'affichage graphique clair et les boutons intuitifs. - Obtenez une qualité d'impression professionnelle pour moins - créez des documents couleur à haut impact à un faible coût par page. - Imprimez à l'aide d'encres individuelles abordables ; économisez davantage sur les impressions fréquentes en choisissant des cartouches d'encre XL de grande capacité. - Imprimez des documents à séchage rapide avec les papiers au logo ColorLok®, et des documents résistants qui durent. - Imprimez jusqu'au bord du papier pour des photos sans bord et autres matériaux professionnels. Le calcul d'économie d'énergie suppose que l'appareil doit être coupé pendant 12 heures par jour de la semaine et 48 heures par week-end. Consommation d'énergie réduite par rapport à un modèle d'utilisation quotidienne classique qui suppose que les appareils restent en mode 'arrêt' pendant la nuit et le week-end.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Imprimante e-tout-en-un HP Officejet 4620
description-en_US-print: Empower your business—easily print from virtually anywhere, and share resources across a wireless network. Print, copy, scan—even fax—and produce professional-quality color at a low cost per page. Features Efficient web connectivity--even print on the go - Print from mobile devices on the go. With HP ePrint, now you can print from virtually anywhere. - Now with Apple® AirPrint™. Simply print wirelessly from your iPad®, iPhone®, or iPod touch®. - Stay connected—share on a wireless network or through the Hi-Speed USB port. Standout versatility to increase productivity - Print, copy, scan, and fax with ease. Fax and scan documents directly to a PC and to network folders. - Finish projects fast—use the 35-page automatic document feeder to save time. - Print everyday documents at ISO speeds up to 8 ppm black and up to 7.5 ppm color. - Easily print, scan, and copy documents from the convenient 2.0-inch (5.08 cm) diagonal mono graphic display. Professional color you can count on—for less - Print professional color for a low cost per page, and save on frequent printing, using high-capacity cartridges. - Print documents affordably with four individual inks. - Produce fast-drying documents, using papers with the ColorLok® logo, and print fade-resistant documents. - Produce documents, brochures, and flyers without borders—print all the way to the edge of the page. Outstanding energy and resource savings - Conserve resources, using an ENERGY STAR® qualified e-all-in-one with smart energy-saving modes. - Use a product that is composed of recyclable plastics. - Cut waste—get free and easy recycling with HP Planet Partners. - Use Original HP cartridges for quality, reliability, and rewards. Eco Highlights - Save up to 40% on energy—preset your device to turn On or Off with Schedule On and Schedule Off. - Save paper by viewing and storing faxes electronically. - Free, convenient cartridge recycling in 47 countries. Energy savings calculation assumes the device is scheduled to be off for 12 hours per weekday and 48 hours per weekend. Reduced energy use is compared with a typical daily usage model, which assumes devices remain in "Off" mode overnight and on the weekend.
description-en_US-mobile: Officejet 4620 e-All-in-One Printer
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Steigern Sie die geschäftliche Effizienz und drucken Sie von nahezu überall aus – mit Wireless-Netzwerkfunktionen und mobilem Drucken.1,2 Sie können jetzt mehr Aufgaben erledigen (drucken, kopieren, scannen und faxen) und professionelle Farbdokumente zu niedrigen Kosten pro Seite erstellen.

Features
Kabelloses oder mobiles Drucken dank einer Vielzahl von Optionen für den mobilen Druck.1,2
• Entdecken Sie die Vorteile des mobilen Druckens mit HP ePrint – von nun an können Sie von praktisch überall aus drucken.2

Dank einer Vielzahl benutzerfreundlicher und produktivitätsorientierter Tools können Sie mehr Aufgaben erledigen.
• Einfaches Drucken, Kopieren, Scannen und Faxen – Scannen und Faxen direkt an einen PC oder in Netzwerkordner.

Professionelle Farbdrucke zu niedrigen Kosten pro Seite.
• Professionelle Druckqualität zu niedrigeren Kosten – erstellen Sie eindrucksvolle Farbdokumente zu niedrigen Kosten pro Seite.

1Die Leistung beim kabellosen Einsatz ist abhängig von den Umgebungsbedingungen und der Entfernung vom Access Point. Kabelloser Betrieb nur mit 2,4-GHz-Routern möglich.
2Zur Verwendung dieser Funktionen benötigt der Drucker einen Internetzugang. Anwendung mit jedem Internet- und E-Mail-fähigen Gerät möglich. Die Druckgeschwindigkeiten können variieren. Eine Liste der unterstützten Dokument- und Bildtypen finden Sie unter www.hp.com/go/eprintcenter.
description-de_DE-mobile: HP Officejet 4600 Plus e-All-in-One Print/Fax/Copy/Scan
name: HP Officejet 4620 e-AiO

description-en_US-print: Streamlined Reliability A smart, reliable option for bringing duplex printing, copying, scanning and high-speed faxing into one machine, with up to 40 ppm and the ability to scan documents straight to e-mail or a flash drive. As Easy as It Gets Right out of the box, you’ll power through tasks at exceptionally fast speeds—up to 40 ppm. It’s a breeze to set up, install, and start enjoying the benefit of doing all those multiple tasks on one user-friendly machine. Smarter Printer, Smarter Business The large LCD color touch screen offers amazingly simple access to a rich range of features, including duplex scanning, advanced copying and easy user authorization for enhanced security. You can even customize the touch screen to meet your workgroup’s specific needs. Small in Size, Huge on Features Enjoy an intelligent, efficient combination of built-in features like duplex printing, copying and scanning plus a front Direct USB port. Gives you the ability to scan to multiple destinations, letting your workgroup breeze through intense workloads. Save the Earth and Money Lower your cost per page while helping conserve resources with up to 9,000*-page or 15,000*-page replacement cartridges. Add that to the automatic duplex printing and the energy savings of consolidating to one smart device, and you’re taking big steps toward an eco-conscious workplace. (*Declared yield in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752.)

Don't need fax? Consider the Lexmark X864dhe 3. Gain Real Momentum The Lexmark X864dhe 4 monochrome laser MFP with fax is the top of the X860 Series, provides fax, automatic duplexing and standard input capacity for up to 3,100 sheet, expandable to 5,100 sheets with optional paper handling accessories. Enormously intuitive touch screen Lexmark’s award-winning 9-inch (22.9 cm) colour e-Task touch screen gives you fast, easy access to document capture and workflow functions. Tailor it to your business requirements with the icons and shortcuts you need most. Optional finishing Save time, money and office space by eliminating pre-printed documents and producing more of your print jobs on demand and in-house. Finishing options including stapling, hole punching (2/3 or 2/4 holes), offset stacking and booklet folding with overlap adjustment. State-of-the-art security Protects you from risk with state-of-the-art features for secure management, network communication and information storage. What’s more, customisable user-access controls let you enable or disable functions with ease. Tailor it to your business requirements with the icons and shortcuts you need most. Optional finishing Save time, money and office space by eliminating pre-printed documents and producing more of your print jobs on demand and in-house. Finishing options including stapling, hole punching (2/3 or 2/4 holes), offset stacking and booklet folding with overlap adjustment. description-en_US-print: The MC561 Color MFP enhances small-to-medium workgroup productivity with robust print/copy/scan/fax functionality The MC561 Color MFP from OKI Printing Solutions combines high-quality color and four-in-one functionality with speed, reliability and ease of use—superior value from a desktop device that has a footprint small enough to fit easily into your environment. It’s the perfect solution for the smallto medium-size workgroups in your company. Enhance the productivity of your staff – The MC561 Color MFP is fast: it prints or copies up to 27 color pages or 31 black & white pages per minute, with the first color page printing in just 8 seconds.1 It delivers color duplex prints or copies at the rate of 14 ppm, black & white at 16 ppm. Its reversing automatic document feeder (RADF) quickly scans both sides of a document, and its multi-tasking capabilities let you set up or perform two tasks at the same time. And, with a duty cycle of up to 60,000 pages per month, this durable device can be relied upon to handle large daily print and copy volumes. Scan at the machine or from your desk – With the MC561 Color MFP, you can turn hard-copy documents into electronic files by placing them in the RADF or directly onto the flatbed scanner, scan them in black & white or color, and send the scan to a locally attached PC, to the shared directory on the network (without the need for additional software), to an e-mail address or to an FTP site. You can also remotely preview and scan your documents on your PC via the network connection and TWAIN driver. You can insert a USB memory stick into the port conveniently located on the front of the unit and save scans to or print files directly from the stick. With Direct Print, you can even print PDF files without opening an application. The MC561 MFP prints and copies in HD Color, an OKI® exclusive: multi-level printheads and microfine toner provide more detail, greater color depth and reduced grain, for breathtaking output even on ordinary office paper. It can make your job easier – The MC561 Color MFP is really user friendly. It’s network-ready right out of the box and has an intuitive operator panel that’s simple to use, with a 3.5" backlit LCD display that tilts up for easy reading, 1-touch keys for fast dialing, and a full QWERTY keyboard. It comes with a 4 GB SD card for file storage, which can be upgraded to 16 GB as your needs grow. It’s also a full-featured fax – The MC561 Color MFP has dual access functionality that lets you scan faxes into memory while the unit is busy sending or receiving faxes. It comes with a number of features found in more expensive units, such as T.37 Internet faxing, Tel/Fax auto switching, distinctive ring to differentiate between incoming fax messages and phone calls, a telephone answering device (TAD) interface, speed-dial ID display, and generous fax memory. Expect more support – You can expect total support from your Authorized OKI Printing Solutions MFP provider. Convert hard copies to digital files, manage your document workflow, and help the environment. The MC561 Color MFP lets you do it all Full functionality at your fingertips – The userfriendly operator panel of the MC561 Color MFP features a clear, organized array of navigation buttons, a backlit LCD display, alphanumeric keypad, 1-touch fax dialing keys, and a full QWERTY keyboard. The MC561 also comes with this productivity-enhancing software: PaperPort® software from Nuance® easily turns piles of paper and photos into PDF and JPEG files— using the MFP’s scanner—and saves them to your computer for future use. OmniPage® from Nuance —optical character recognition (OCR) software—quickly turns hardcopy office documents and forms into electronic files for easy editing, searching and sharing. Desktop Capture Solution —works through PaperPort’s Active Directory Authentication to move scanned documents into your SharePoint® or DocuWare® workflow, quickly and easily.5 Document management made simple – The MC561 Color MFP includes ActKey software that lets you move between scan-to tasks—including Scan-to-Folder, Scan-to-Application and Scan-to- PC Fax—with a single click. Environmentally friendly features – The MC561 Color MFP also helps you control your effect on the planet’s health by providing: Automatic ECO Mode When you’re only printing a few pages, the MC561 Color MFP’s response is to enter this energy-saving, performance-enhancing setting. Same terrific output, lower power consumption. Everybody wins. Deep Sleep Mode The MC561 Color MFP takes power-saving even more seriously when left on for an extended period: it slips into a “deep sleep” that expends just over a single watt to maintain. Mono Resource-Print Mode Even when the color toner runs out, you can still print needed documents in crisp, clear black & white. Simply cancel the original job and select this energy-efficient mode in the printer driver. One-piece image drum This long-lasting, userreplaceable consumable remains friendly to your budget while lowering the number of items to dispose of and store. Energy Star ® compliance With its lower power consumption—especially in Deep Sleep Mode— and standard duplexing, the MC561 Color MFP meets the government’s standards for energy efficiency.

description-en_US-print: Streamlined Reliability A smart, reliable option for bringing duplex printing, copying, scanning and high-speed faxing into one machine, with up to 40 ppm and the ability to scan documents straight to e-mail or a flash drive. As Easy as It Gets Right out of the box, you’ll power through tasks at exceptionally fast speeds—up to 40 ppm. It’s a breeze to set up, install, and start enjoying the benefit of doing all those multiple tasks on one user-friendly machine. Smarter Printer, Smarter Business The large LCD color touch screen offers amazingly simple access to a rich range of features, including duplex scanning, advanced copying and easy user authorization for enhanced security. You can even customize the touch screen to meet your workgroup’s specific needs. Small in Size, Huge on Features Enjoy an intelligent, efficient combination of built-in features like duplex printing, copying and scanning plus a front Direct USB port. Gives you the ability to scan to multiple destinations, letting your workgroup breeze through intense workloads. Save the Earth and Money Lower your cost per page while helping conserve resources with up to 9,000*-page or 15,000*-page replacement cartridges. Add that to the automatic duplex printing and the energy savings of consolidating to one smart device, and you’re taking big steps toward an eco-conscious workplace. (*Declared yield in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752.)

Designed to bring you class-leading functionality including rapid print and copy speeds, colour scanning, built-in fax and two-sided printing as standard. It even comes with an extendable paper supply and a choice of long-life consumables for high workloads. What’s more, it uses OKI’s ultra-reliable digital LED print technology, backed by the industry’s longest warranty cover, to keep you printing page after page, day after day. Enhanced efficiency The network-ready MB480, with optional extendable paper supply backed with ultra-high capacity consumables lets your entire team print and copy for longer, with fewer interruptions. Ultimate dependability Designed for trouble-free operation and reliability that you can really depend upon, the MB480 comes with a full 3-year parts and labour warranty as standard. Not only that, the digital LED print head is protected by its own 5-year warranty! Effortless productivity Whatever the task: printing, copying, scanning or faxing - the intuitive controls of the MB480 boosts productivity right across the office by letting everyone get more done, faster.

description-en_US-print: MC361 Color MFP Highlights: - Print and copy at speeds up to 23 ppm in color, 25 ppm in black & white1; - HD Color printing technology for outstanding print and copy quality; - Multi-tasking functionality standard, enabling two tasks to be performed at once; - 3.5" backlit, tilting LCD operator panel with 1-touch fax dialing keys; - PCL® and PostScript® 3™ emulations; - Duplex (2-sided) printing/copying, standard; - Full-featured fax with dual access functionality and 4 MB fax memory2; - Multiple scan-to locations: PC, network, FTP, e-mail or USB memory stick; - Print from USB memory stick; - 50-sheet reversing automatic document feeder (RADF), standard – saves time and energy; - 350-sheet standard paper capacity, expands to 880 sheets with optional 2nd tray; - Banner printing capability on sheets up to 52" in length3; - Color Access Policy Manager controls printing costs by defining usage rules; - Separate CMYK toner cartridges for lower cost of operation; - Compact design to fit even the smallest environment; - ENERGY STAR® compliant. The MC361 Color MFP from OKI Printing Solutions combines speed, reliability and ease of use with high-quality color and four-in-one functionality— all in an affordable desktop device with a footprint small enough to fit easily into your work space. It’s the perfect solution for individuals and small workgroups. Features that enhance productivity – Do more, faster. The MC361 Color MFP prints or copies up to 23 color pages or 25 black & white pages per minute, with the first color page printing in just 9 seconds.1 It has a reversing automatic document feeder (RADF) that quickly scans both sides of a document. Color duplex printing occurs at 12 ppm, black & white at 13 ppm. And its multi-tasking capabilities let you set up or perform two tasks at the same time. Versatile scanning capabilities – Use the MC361 Color MFP to turn hard-copy documents into electronic files by placing them in the RADF or directly onto the flatbed scanner, and scanning them in black & white or color. Send a document directly to a locally attached PC or to the shared directory on the network (without the need for additional software), to an e-mail address or to an FTP site. Or simply insert a USB memory stick into the port conveniently located on the front of the unit and save your scan Users can also print files from a USB stick, print PDF files with Direct Print without opening an application, and remotely preview and scan via their network connection and TWAIN driver. The MC361 MFP prints and copies in HD Color, an OKI® exclusive: multi-level printheads and microfine toner provide more detail, greater color depth and reduced grain, for breathtaking output even on ordinary office paper—with Auto Color Balance to ensure color consistency across all jobs. And, with a duty cycle of up to 45,000 pages per month, this durable device can be relied upon to handle large daily print and copy volumes. A full-featured fax device – The MC361 Color MFP has dual access functionality that lets you scan faxes into memory while the unit is busy sending or receiving faxes. It also comes with a number of features found in more expensive MFP devices: T.37 Internet faxing, Tel/Fax auto switching, telephone answering device (TAD) interface, distinctive ring to differentiate between incoming fax messages and phone calls, speed-dial ID display, and generous fax memory. Making your job easier – The MC361 Color MFP is really user friendly. It’s network-ready right out of the box and has an intuitive operator panel that’s simple to use, with a 3.5" backlit LCD display that tilts up for easy reading. Expect more support – You can expect total support from your Authorized OKI Printing Solutions MFP provider.
